Question: azaghr
Answer: azaghr ayk aaly stahay ، amwmy mksad kay prwghramngh zaban hay jo mtadd prwghramngh nmwnwn ki hamayt krty hay ، js main sakhty ، aabjykt par mbny aur fnkshnl prwghramngh 1 shaml hayn۔asay aksar is ki jama mayary laibryry 1 ki wjha sy "bytryan shaml" zaban kay tawr par byan kya jata haay۔azaghr ka mtalb ayk aasany sy prahnay kay kabl zaban hay ، js main zuaf bay trtyby farmytngh hawty hay jo aksar anghryzay klydy alfaza astamal krty hay jahan dusri zabanyn awkaf 1 ka astamal krty hayn۔bhat sy dusri zabanwn kay braks ، yeh byanat ki ajazat denay kay bad blaks ko khtm karnay kay liye ghhwbghhraly khtawta ka astamal nahin krta hay ، aur shaza wa nadr hi astamal hawta haay۔azaghr ki bray mayary laibryry bohat sy kamwn kay liye mwzawn twlza mhaya krty hay aur isy aam tawr par is ki sab sy bray taakt 1 kay tawr par pysh kya jata haay۔as ka astamal srwr par wyb ayply kyshnza bnanay kay liye ، saft wyir kay sath sath wrk flwza bnanay kay liye ، aur dayta bys sstm 2 sy rabtaha kaim karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔azaghr failwn ko bhi prah sakta aur is main trmym krskta haay۔ azaghr sykhnay kay liye bohat sary wsail dstyab hain ، bshmwl srkary wyb sait ، jo sbk aur hadayt namha 3 kay sath ، azaghr ki mayary laibryry kay liye dstawyzaat pysh krty haay۔W3Schools ayk azaghr tywtwryl pysh krta hay js main fail hayndalngh ، dayta bys hayndalngh ، mshkyn ، msaalwn aur kwizaza 4 jesay mwzuwaat ka ahaataha kya gaya haay۔kwda kydaymy abtdaiy aur aaly drjay kay saarfyn kay liye azaghr kwrsza aur sbk pysh krta haay۔

Question: fharst main tamam nmbrwn ka mjmwaha tlash karnay kay liye ayk azaghr prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr prwghram hay js main tamam tadad ka mjmwaha ayk fharst main mlahazaha kya jata hay () fnkshn ka astamal karty hawiay: paiythwnmy_ lst = [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] SUM_OF_LIST = SUM (my_list) prnt ("fharst ka mjmwaha:" ، "SUM_OF_LIST) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay kuch nmbrwn kay sath MY_LIST namy ayk fharst shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh fharst main mwjwd tamam nmbrwn kay mjmwaha ka hasab lghanay kay liye blt un swm () fnkshn ka astamal krta hay aur isy SUM_OF_LIST namy mtghyr main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey fharst ka mjmwaha prnt krta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal yeh haay: paiythwnmy_ lst = [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] SUM_OF_LIST = 0 kay liye my_list main nmbr: SUM_OF_LIST += nmbr prnt ("fharst ka mjmwaha haay:" ، SUM_OF_LIST) yeh prwghram pehlay kuch nmbrwn kay sath ayk fharst shrwa krta hay js main kuch tadad shaml hawty haay۔as kay bad ، yeh Sum_of_list namy mtghyr ki abtda krta haay۔ aghla ، yeh fharst main hr nmbr kay zaryaay lwp kay liye A ka astamal krta hay aur isy Sum_of_list mtghyr main shaml krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey fharst ka mjmwaha prnt krta haay۔

Question: kesi fnkshn ko yeh chyk karnay kay liye nafza karain keh aya dyiay gaye astrngh ayk pylndarwwm haay۔
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr fnkshn hay keh aya yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya dyiay gaye tar ayk pylyndrwwm haay: paiythwndaf aai ays_palndarwwm (strngh): # tar ko chhwtay sy kys main tbdyl karain aur ghair alfynwmyrk harwf ko hata dyn۔) .lower () # chyk karain keh aya tar is kay alt rytrn strngh == strngh kay brabr hay [::-1] yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk tar lyta hay aur pehlay tamam ghair alfanwmrk harwf ko hatata hay aur is main shmwlyt ka astamal karty hoey strngh ko chhwtay main tbdyl krta haay۔() aur kam () tarykay۔phr ، yeh janch pratal krta hay keh aya astrngh slaisngh ka astamal karty hoey is kay alt kay brabr haay۔aghr tar is kay alt kay brabr hay tou ، fnkshn drst lwtta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh tar ayk pylndarwwm haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh jhwty lwtta haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythnstrngh = "ayk aadmy ، ayk mnsawbha ، ayk nhar: panama" agar is_palindrome (strngh): prnt ("tar ayk palindrome haay۔") awr: prnt kryn۔("strngh ayk pylyndrwwm nahin haay۔") yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay kuch mtn kay sath astrngh namy tar shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh un pt kay btawr astrngh kay sath IS_Palindrome () fnkshn ko kal krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt krta hay keh aya tar ayk pylndarwwm hay ya prnt () fnkshn astamal nahin krrhaa haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt "strngh ayk pylndarwwm haay۔"

Question: ayk mkrrha nmbr tak tamam praim nmbr tyar karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: ayrtwstynza alghwrthm ki chhlny ka astamal karty hoey kesi mkhsawsa nmbr tak tamam bnyady tadad tyar karnay kay liye ayk azaghr prwghram haay: paiythndaf jnryt_praimza (ayn): # ayk bwlyn srny "praim [0..n]" bnaiyn aur # tamam andrajat ko is ko sch smjha jata haay۔praim = [rynj main I kay liye sch (n+1)] p = 2 jabky p ** 2 <= n: # agar praim [p] tbdyl nahin kya gaya hay ، tou yeh ayk aham hay agar praim [p]: # ap dayt krynrynj (py ** 2 ، ayn+1 ، py) kay liye py kay zurb: praim [i] = ghalat py+= 1 # rynj main py kay liye tamam praim nmbr prnt karain (2 ، n+1): agar praim [aghr praim [P]: prnt (P) yeh prwghram un pt kay tawr par ayk add N lyta hay aur ayrtwstyns alghwrthm ki chhlny ka astamal karty hoey N tak tamam bnyady nmbr tyar krta haay۔alghwrthm saiza N+1 ka bwlyn srny praim bnanay aur tamam andrajat ko sch main shrwa krkay kam krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh N kay mrba rwt tak tamam nmbrwn par tkrar krta hay aur hr nmbr kay tamam zurbwn ko ghalat main ap dayt krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh un tamam nmbrwn ko prnt krta hay jo ab bhi praim srny main drst hayn۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr = 50 jynryt_praimza (ayn) yeh prwghram jnryt_praimza () fnkshn aur prnts ka astamal karty hoey 50 tak tamam praim nmbr tyar krta haay۔anhayn knswl myn۔aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 235711131719232931374143471 JAVATPOINT2SANFONDRY3STACKOVERFLOW4PROGROGRAMIZ5GEEKSFORGEEKS

Question: ayk fnkshn bnaiyn jo un pt kay tawr par tar lyta hay aur tar main hr krdar ki frykwinsy lwtata haay۔
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr fnkshn hay jo un pt kay tawr par ayk tar lyta hay aur tar main hr krdar ki frykwinsy ko lwtata haay: pythwndaf char_frydaykwnsy (strngh): # hr krdar ki frykwinsy ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk khaly lght bnaiyn = {} # lwp hr krdar main hr krdar kay zaryaaytar main char kay liye tar: # agar krdar pehlay sy hi lght main hay tou ، is ki ghnty main azuafha karain agar fryk main char: fryk [char] += 1 # dusri sawrt main ، 1 aur ki ghnty kay sath krdar ko lght main shaml kryn: fryk [char [char] = 1 # lwtaiyn krdar ki frykwinsy ki lght ko lwtaiyn frykts fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk tar lyta hay aur hr krdar ki tadd ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye fryk namy ayk khaly lght shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh hr krdar ko tar main khraa krta hay aur chyk krta hay keh kya krdar pehlay sy hi lght main haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، is krdar ki ghnty main azuafha hawta haay۔aghr yeh nahin hay tou ، is nay krdar ko lght main 1 ki ghnty kay sath shaml kya haay۔ aakhr main ، yeh krdar ki tadd ki lght ko lwtata haay۔ fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: pythnstrngh = "haylw ، wrlda!" fryk = char_frykwnsy (strngh (strngh) prnt (fryk) yeh prwghram pehlay kuch mtn kay sath strngh namy tar shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh char_frykwynsy () ko astrngh kay sath un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr main fryk kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey krdar ki tadd ki lght ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، pydawar hawghy: {'H': 1 ، 'E': 1 ، 'L': 3 ، 'O': 2 ، '،': 1 ، '': 1 ، 'W': 1، 'r': 1 ، 'd': 1 ، '!': 1} yeh lght un pt main hr krdar ki tadd ko zaahar krty haay۔

Question: trtyb shuda fharst main kesi ansar ki pwzayshn tlash karnay kay liye bainry srch alghwrthm ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ayk trtyb shuda fharst main kesi ansar ki pwzayshn tlash karnay kay liye bainry srch alghwrthm ka azaghr ka nfaza yahan haay: pythndaf bainry_sarch (aar ، ayks): # abtdaiy akdar ko pehlay aur aakhry asharywn kay liye pehlay = 0 aakhry = lyn (aar aar) -1 # lwp jab tak keh pehla andayks aakhry andayks sy kam ya is kay brabr nahin hawta hay jabky pehla <= aakhry: # drmyany andayks mda = (phala + aakhry) ka hasab lghaiyn // 2 # agar drmyany ansar hadf hay tou ، is ka andayks waps karain aghraar aar [mda] == ayks: wsta # lwtyn # agar hadf drmyany ansar sy kam hay tou ، baien aadhay aylf aar aar [mda]> x: aakhry = wsta - 1 # tlash karain agar hadf drmyany ansar sy zayada hay tou ، tlash kryndaiyn aadhay awr: pehla = wsta + 1 # agar hadf nahin mila hay tou ، wapsy -1 rytrn -1 -1 is fnkshn main ayk trtyb shuda fharst AR aur ayk hadf ansar X ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur is fharst main hadf ansar ka andayks waps krta haay۔bainry tlash alghwrthm۔alghwrthm bar bar tlash kay wkfay ko aadhay hasaay main tksym krkay kam krta hay jab tak keh hadf ansar nah mil jaye ya tlash ka wkfha khaly nah haw۔har tkrar main ، yeh tlash kay wkfay kay drmyany ansar ko hadf ansar sy mwazanha krta hay aur is kay mtaabk tlash kay wkfay ko ap dayt krta haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr = [1 ، 3 ، 5 ، 7 ، 9] x = 5result= bainry_sarch (aar ، ayks) agar ntyjha! = -1: prnt (ayf "ansar {x} andayks main mwjwd hay {ntyjha}") awr: prnt ("ansar saf main mwjwd nahin haay") yeh prwghram pehlay trtyb sy shrwa krta haayfharst ko aay aar aar aur ayk hadf ansar x kaha jata haay۔as kay bad ، yeh bainry_srch () ko ARR aur X kay sath fnkshn kehty hain aur un pt kay tawr par is kay ntyjay main ayk mtghyr kay ntyjay main hawta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt krta hay keh aya hadf ansar fharst main mwjwd hay aur prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey is ka andayks۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt "ansar 5 andayks 2 par mwjwd haay"

Question: lnkda fharst ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas lkhyn aur is ko pltnay kay liye ayk tarykha nafza kryn۔
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr ki klas hay jo ayk mnslk fharst ki nmaindghy krty hay aur is ko alt karnay kay liye ayk tarykha: azaghr klas nwda: dayf __init __ (khwd ، dayta): sylf daata = dayta sylf۔ nykst = nwn klas lnkda lst: dayf __init __ (khwd): koi bhi nhayn۔dakhl karain (khwd ، dayta): nya_nwda = nwda (dayta) agar sylf۔ hayda: mwjwdha = sylf۔: mwjwdha = sylf hayda kay doran mwjwdha: prnt (krnt.dayta ، aynda = "") mwjwdha = krnt۔ nykst prnt () dayf rywrs (khwd): pchhla = koi bhi nahin mwjwdha = khud nhayn۔mwjwdha۔ nykst = pchhla sabkha = mwjwdha mwjwdha = aghla_nwda sylf۔ hayda = pchhla klas nwda klas aur lnkda lst klas kay sath ayk mnslk fharst ki nmaindghy krty haay۔nwda klas main dayta wsaf aur aghly wsaf hay jo fharst main aghlay nwda ki taraf asharha krta haay۔lnkda lst klas main ayk sr wsaf hay jo fharst main pehlay nwda ki taraf asharha krta haay۔as main fharst kay akhttam par ayk nya nwda dakhl karnay ، fharst ko prnt karnay aur fharst ko alt karnay kay tarykay bhi mwjwd hayn۔ rywrs () tarykha sy mnslk fharst ko alt karnay kay liye tkrary nktaha nzar ka astamal kya gaya haay۔yha baltrtyb do pwaintrza ، pchhlay aur mwjwdha ، kesi ko aur fharst kay srbraha ko baltrtyb shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh fharst kay zaryaay tkrar krta hay aur pchhlay nwda ki taraf asharha karnay kay liye hr nwda ki aghly wsaf ko ap dayt krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh aakhry nwda ki taraf asharha karnay kay liye fharst kay hayda wsaf ko ap dayt krta hay ، jo ab alt lst ka pehla nwda haay۔ klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythwnmy_ lst = lnkda lst () my_list.insert (1) my_list.INSERT (2) my_list.insert (3) my_list.insert (4) my_list.insert (5) prnt ("asal fharst:") my_list.print_list () my_list.reverse () prnt ("alt lst:") my_list.print_list () yeh prwghram pehlay kuch nwdas kay sath My_list namy ayk mnslk fharst ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh prnt_ lst () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey asal fharst prnt krta haay۔aghla ، yeh alt () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey fharst ko tbdyl krta hay aur prnt_ lst () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey alt fharst ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: asal fharst: 1 2 3 4 5 alt alt fharst: 5 4 3 2 1 1 aydawkytw 2 alfakwdanghs kِl ays 3 kwdanghnghnjas 4 ays ayn faؤndary 5 jy ay ay ayksfwrjyks

Question: ayk aysa fnkshn bnaiyn js main tar ki fharst main sab sy tawyl aam pryfks strngh mil jaiay۔
Answer: tar ki fharst main sab sy tawyl aam pryfks strngh tlash karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl azaghr fnkshn ka astamal krsktay hayn: paiythndaf tawyl tryn_kwmwn_pryfks (ays ty aar ays): agar ays ty aar nahin hay tw: waps karain "" "astrnghza ki fharst ko trtyb dyn۔phaly aur aakhry dawr kay darmiyan kay darmiyan = "" kay liye I kay liye (lyn (strs [0])): agar strs [0] [i] == strs [-1] [i]: sabkha += strs [0][i] awr: bryk rytrn pryfkst yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par astrnghza ays ty aar ki fharst lyta hay aur un main sab sy tawyl aam pryfks astrngh ko lwtata haay۔yha pehlay janch pratal krta hay keh aya fharst khaly hay aur agar khaly tar waps krta hay tw۔as kay bad ، yeh harf thajy trtyb main tarwn ki fharst ko trtyb dyta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh fharst main pehlay strngh kay krdarwn kay zaryaay tkrar krta hay aur fharst main aakhry strngh main mtalkha krdarwn sy un ka mwazanha krta haay۔aghr harwf ayk jesay hain tou ، yeh un ko sabkha tar main shaml krta haay۔aghr woh mkhtlf hain tou ، yeh lwp sy twt jata hay aur pryfks strngh ko waps krta haay۔ fnkshn ko astamal karnay kay tarykha ki ayk msaal haay: paiythnstrns = ["phwl" ، "flw" ، "flait"] pryfks = tawyl tryn_kwmwn_pryfks (ays ty aar ays) prnt (prnt ("sb sy tawyl mshtrkha sabkha:" ، sabkha) yeh prwghram pehlay ays ty aar ays namy tar ki fharst shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh ays ty aar kay sath tawyl tryn_kwmwn_pryfks () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko ayk mtghyr kay nam par astwr krta hay jsay sabkha kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey sab sy tawyl aam pryfks astrngh prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt "sb sy tawyl aam sabkha: FL" hawgha۔

Question: ayk aysay sjawt ko nafza karain jo kesi fnkshn kay aml kay wkt ki pymaish kray۔
Answer: ayk azaghr daykwrytr bnanay kay liye jo kesi fnkshn kay aml kay wkt ki pymaish krta hay ، hum taim madaywl astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiytwnympwrt taim dayf pymaish_ taim (fnk): day ay ayf rypr (*aarghs ، ** KWARGS): astart_ taim = taim.pyrf_kwntr () ntyjha = fnk (** aarghs ، ** KWARGS) akhttam_ wkt = wkt = wkt () prnt () prnt () prnt () prnt () prnt kryn۔f "fnkshn {func .__ name__} take {end_time - start_time: .8f} syknda par amldraamd karnay kay liay۔") wapsy ka ntyjha rytrn ryprys daykwrytr un pt kay tawr par ayk fnkshn fnk lyta hay aur ayk rypr fnkshn waps krta hay jo fnk kay amldraamd kay wkt ki pymaish krta haay۔rypr fnkshn wkt ka astamal krta haay۔as kay bad yeh do bar kay darmiyan frk ka hasab lghata hay aur fnk kay amldraamd kay wkt prnt krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh fnk ko kal karnay ka ntyjha lwtata haay۔ hr ayk ki msaal hay keh sjawt ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: azaghr@pymaish_tymydaf my_func (n): kal = rkm ((x kay liye x kay liye (0 ، n ** 2))) waps klymy_fwnk(10000) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay My_func namy ayk fnkshn ki wzuahat krta hay jo un pt kay tawr par ayk add N lyta hay aur 0 sy N ** 2 tak tamam nmbrwn ki rkm ka hasab lghata haay۔as kay bad ، yeh @ nhaw ka astamal karty hoey pymaish_ taim daykwrytr kay sath my_func fnkshn ko sjata haay۔aakhr main ، is nay 10000 kay un pt kay sath sjaya hoa my_func fnkshn kaha haay۔ aaؤt pt kuch is tarah hawgha: fnkshn my_func par aml draamd main 0.00007100 syknda lghay۔

Question: kesi khasa klyd ki bnyad par lght ki fharst trtyb denay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: ayk mkhsawsa klyd ki bnyad par lght ki fharst ko trtyb denay kay l we ، hum azaghr main trtyb shuda () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythwndaf trtyb_lst_f_ dakt (fharst_ aw ayf_ dakt ، klyd): chhantay hawiay_ lst = trtyb shuda (fharst_ aw ayf_ dakt ، klydy = lymbdaa ayks: ayks [klydy]) rytrn sytda_ lsts fnkshn lst_f_ dakt ki fharst lyta haay۔mkhsawsa klyd ki bnyad par lghat ky۔trtyb shuda () fnkshn lght ki fharst aur ayk klydy pyramytr lyta hay ، jo lght ki klyd ki wzuahat krta hay js kay zaryaha fharst ko trtyb diya jana chahaiay۔as maamlay main ، hum fharst main hr lght sy mkhsawsa klyd ki kdr nkalnay kay liye lymbdaa fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔ fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: pythonmy_list = [{'nam': 'jan' ، 'amr':25} ، {'nam': 'jyn' ، 'amr': 30} ، {'nam': 'bab' ، 'amr': 20}] trtyb shdha_lst = trtyb_ lst_f_ dakt (my_list ، 'amr') prnt (chhantda_ lst)prwghram sab sy pehlay lghat ki ayk fharst shrwa krta hay jsay My_list kaha jata haay۔as kay bad ، yeh SORT_LIST_OF_DICTS () ko MY_LIST aur 'amr' kay sath un pt kay tawr par fnkshn kehty hain aur is kay ntyjay main ayk mtghyr ko trtyb dytay hain js ko chhantya_ lst kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey lghat ki trtyb shuda fharst prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: [{'nam': 'bab' ، 'amr': 20} ، {'nam': 'jan' ، 'amr': 25} ، {'nam': 'jyn'.

Question: kesi dyiay gaye nmbr kay hakykt ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk tkrar wali tkryb ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main tkrar ka astamal karty hoey kesi dyiay gaye nmbr kay hakykt ka hasab lghanay kay liye ، hum ayk aysay fnkshn ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo apnay aap ko ayk chhwty un pt kay sath kal krta hay jab tak keh woh bys kys tak nah phanchay ، jo 1 ki hakykt hay ، jo 1 haay۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: paiytndaffyktwryil (ayn): agar n == 1: wapsy 1 awr: wapsy n * fyktwryil (N-1) yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk add N lyta hay aur tkrar ka astamal karty hoey n ki hakykt ko waps krta haay۔phala agar byan chyk krta hay keh aya un pt nmbr N 1 haay۔aghr n 1 nahin hay tou ، fnkshn N ki msanwaat aur N-1 ki hakykt ko lwtata haay۔yha woh jghha hay jahan tkrar fnkshn kal waka hawty hay ، jahan fnkshn khud ko un pt N-1 kay sath kal krta haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythn = 5result = fyktwryl (ayn) prnt (f "{n} ki hakykt haay{ntyjha} ") yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay N namy ayk antyjr ko 5 ki kymt kay sath shrwa krta haay۔ phir ، yeh N kay sath fyktwryil () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey N ki hakykt prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 5 ki hakykt psndy 120 hay is aaؤt pt main un pt nmbr N ki hakykt psndy zaahar hawty hay js ka astamal fyktwryl () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey kya jata haay۔

Question: yeh chyk karnay kay liye ayk azaghr prwghram lkhyn keh aya astrngh main sirf handsay hawtay hayn۔
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya kesi tar main azaghr main sirf handsay hawtay hain ، hum isdigit () tarykha ya bakaadha azahaar astamal krsktay hayn۔isdigit () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk msaal kay nfaza: paiythndaf par mushtamil haay_wnly_dayjts (strngh): rytrn strngh۔ aaiysdayjt () yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk tar lyta hay aur agar tar sirf handswn aur ghalat par mushtamil hawta hay tou woh sch hawta haay۔isdigit () ka tarykha drst lwtta hay agar tar kay tamam harf handsay hain aur kam aza kam ayk krdar hay ، aur dusri sawrt main ghalat haay۔ fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiytnstrngh 1 = "12345" strngh 2 = "12345a" prnt (pr mushtamil haay_wnly_dayjts.as kay bad ، yeh prnts_wnly_dayjts () ko strngh 1 aur strngh 2 kay sath fnkshn kehty hain aur un pt kay tawr par prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntaij ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: tryflsthys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh pehli strngh main sirf handsay hawtay hain aur dusri tar main kam aza kam ayk ghair handsay ka krdar hawta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiythwnympwrt rydaf par mushtamil haay_wnly_dayjts (strngh): rytrn by aw ayl (re.match ('^[0-9]+$' ، strngh)) yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk tar lyta hay aur agar astrngh main sirf handsay hawtay hain aur agar strngh main sch hawta haay۔jhwta dusri sawrt myn۔bakaadghy sy azahaar '^[0] [1] [2] [3] [4] [5] [6] [7] [7] [8] [9]+$' mychwn main sirf ayk ya zayada handsay hawtay hayn۔tar kay akhttam tk۔aghr bakaadghy sy azahaar tar sy mmasal hawta hay tou ، aur koi bhi nhayn۔ham ntaij ko bwlyn wylyw main tbdyl karnay kay liye BOOL () fnkshn ka astamal karty hayn۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythnstrngh 1 = "12345" strngh 2 = "12345a" prnt (pr mushtamil haay_wnly_dayjts (strngh 1))) # falsytys prwghram sab sy pehlay do tar shrwa krta hay jsay strngh 1 aur strngh 2 kehty hayn۔as kay bad ، yeh prnts_wnly_dayjts () ko strngh 1 aur strngh 2 kay sath fnkshn kehty hain aur un pt kay tawr par prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntaij ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: tryflsthys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh pehli strngh main sirf handsay hawtay hain aur dusray strngh main kam aza kam ayk ghair handsay ka krdar hawta haay۔

Question: fharst main dusra sab sy braa ansar tlash karnay kay liye kesi fnkshn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main ayk fharst main dusra sab sy braa ansar tlash karnay kay bohat sary tarykay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: chhntaiy ka astamal: hum fharst ko nzawl trtyb main trtyb dy saktay hain aur dusra ansar waps krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiythndaf syknda_larst (ayl ays ty): chhantay hawiay_lst = trtyb shuda (LST ، relust = relut) rytrn shard_lst [1] yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk fharst LST lyta hay aur fharst main dusra sab sy braa ansar waps krta haay۔yha sab sy pehlay alt = schay pyramytr kay sath trtyb shuda () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey nzawly trtyb main fharst ko trtyb dyta haay۔phr ، yeh trtyb shuda fharst ka dusra ansar lwtata haay۔ zayada sy zayada () fnkshn ka astamal karty hawiay: hum fharst main zayada sy zayada ansar tlash karnay aur isy hatanay kay liye zayada sy zayada () fnkshn astamal krsktay hain ، phir dusra sab sy braa ansar haasal karnay kay liye zayada sy zayada ansar ko dwbarha tlash kryn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf syknda_larst (ayl ays ty): myks_ylym = myks (ayl ays ty) ayl ays ty۔ rymw (myks_ylym) syknda_myks = myks (ayl ays ty) rytrn syknda_myks fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk fharst ayl ays ty lyta hay aur fharst main dusra sab sy braa ansar waps krta haay۔yha pehlay myks () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey fharst main zayada sy zayada ansar tlash krta hay aur isy myks_ylym namy mtghyr main astwr krta haay۔phr ، yeh hatanay () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey fharst sy zayada sy zayada ansar ko hata dyta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh dusra sab sy braa ansar haasal karnay kay liye ayk bar phir zayada sy zayada ansar tlash krta hay aur isy lwtata haay۔ ayk lwp ka astamal karty hawiay: hum fharst main zayada sy zayada aur dusray zayada sy zayada anasar tlash karnay kay liye ayk lwp ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf syknda_larst (ayl ays ty): myks_ylym = ayl ays ty [0] syknda_myks = ayl ays ty main alym kay liye koi nahin [1:]: agar alym> myks_ylym: syknda_myks = myks_ylym myks_ylym = aylym aylf syknda_myks koi bhi nahin hay ya aylym> syknda_myks: syknda_myks= alym rytrn syknda_maks is fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk fharst LST lyta hay aur fharst main dusra sab sy braa ansar lwtata haay۔yha pehlay fharst main pehlay ansar aur dusra zayada sy zayada ansar kesi ko bhi zayada sy zayada ansar ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh fharst main mwjwd baky anasar kay zaryaay khraa hawta hay aur isi kay mtaabk zayada sy zayada aur dusray zayada sy zayada anasar ko ap dayt krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh dusra zayada sy zayada ansar lwtta haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: paiythwnlst = [3 ، 1 ، 4 ، 1 ، 5 ، 9 ، 2 ، 6 ، 5 ، 3 ، 5] syknda_myks = syknda_larst (ayl ays ty)prnt ("dwsra sab sy braa ansar:" ، syknda_myks) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay ayl ays ty namy fharst ko kuch nmbrwn kay sath shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh LST kay sath dwsray_larst () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kehty hain aur is kay ntyjay ko ayk mtghyr main syknda_myks kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dusra sab sy braa ansar prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: dusra sab sy braa ansar: 6 is aaؤt pt un pt ki fharst main dusra sab sy braa ansar dkhata haay۔

Question: anfrady alfaza ko tbdyl kyay baghair kesi dyiay gaye jmlay ko alta karnay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn۔
Answer: azaghr main anfrady alfaza ko tbdyl kyay baghair kesi dyiay gaye jmlay ko pltanay kay l we ، hum jmlay ko alfaza main tksym krsktay hain ، alfaza ki trtyb ko alt saktay hain ، aur phir un kay sath mil kar un kay sath shaml hawsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf rywrs_syntyns (jmlha): alfaza = jmlha۔ asplt () alfaza۔alfazayha sab sy pehlay asplt () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey jmlay ko alfaza main tksym krta hay ، jo wait aspys harwf main astrngh ko btawr dayfalt tksym krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh alt () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey alfaza kay trtyb ko tbdyl krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh ayk khlaiy krdar kay sath jwain () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk sath mil kar alfaza main shaml hawta haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: paiythnsyntyns = "yha ayk tyst jmlha haay" alt_syntyns = rywrs_syntyns (jmlha) prnt ("prnt ("alt jmlha: "، alt_syntyns) yeh prwghram pehlay kesi mtn kay sath jmlay kay nam sy ayk tar shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh un pt kay tawr par rywrs_syntyns () fnkshn ko jmlay kay sath kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr main tbdyl krta hay jsay alt_syntyns kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey alt jmlay ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: alt jmlha: jmlha tyst A hay yeh aaؤt pt un pt jmlha main anfrady alfaza ko tbdyl kyay baghair alt jmlay ko zaahar krta haay۔

Question: "astyk ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas lkhyn aur is kay psh ، pap aur jhanknay kay tarykwn ko nafza kryn۔"
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr ki klas hay jo astyk aur is kay psh ، pap ، aur jhanknay kay tarykwn ki nmaindghy krty haay: paiytwnklas astyk: dayf __init __ (khwd): sylf۔ aaitmza = [] dayf psh (khwd ، aaitm)(khwd): agar khud nhayn۔ IS_EMPTY (): waps kryn۔(self.items) == 0 yeh klas astyk klas waly astyk ki nmaindghy krty haay۔__init __ () tarykha astyk anasar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye aaitm namy khaly fharst ki abtda krta haay۔psh () ka tarykha kesi shay ko un pt kay tawr par la jata hay aur is ko zumymha () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey astyk kay awpry hasaay main shaml krta haay۔aghr astyk khaly nahin hay tou pap () ka tarykha pap () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey astyk kay awpry ansar ko hatata hay aur waps krta haay۔aghr astyk khaly nahin hay tou andayks -1 ka astamal karty hoey jhanknay wala () tarykha astyk kay awpry ansar ko lwtata haay۔aghr astyk khaly aur ghalat hay tou IS_EMPTY () ka tarykha drst lwtta haay۔ klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: pythonmy_stack = astyk () my_stack.push (1) my_stack.push (2) my_stack.push (3) prnt("tap ansar:" ، my_stack.peek ()) prnt ("papda ansar:" ، my_stack.pop ()) prnt ("papda ansar:" ، my_stack.pop ()) prnt ("kya astyk khaly haay؟"، my_stack.is_empty ()) yeh prwghram pehlay kuch anasar kay sath My_stack namy ayk astyk ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh psh () ، jhanknay () ، pap () ، aur aai ays pyty () maiy_ astyk aabjykt kay tarykwn ko kehty hain aur prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntaij ko prnt karty hayn۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: tap ansar: 3 pyp ansar: 3 pyp ansar: 2 kya astyk khaly haay؟falsytys aaؤt pt astyk ka awpry ansar ، papda anasar ، aur chahaay astyk khaly hay ya nhayn۔

Question: aardar ko mhafwza rkhtay hoey kesi fharst sy nkl ko hatanay kay liye kesi fnkshn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main aardar ko mhafwza rkhtay hoey kesi fharst sy nklyn hatanay kay l we ، hum fharst (DICK.FROMKEYS (fharst)) ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paithwndaf hataiyn_dawplykyts (ayl ays ty): rytrn lst (dakt.fwmkyza (ayl ays ty)) yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk fharst li ays ty lyta hay aur aardar ko mhafwza rkhtay hoey hata dyiay gaye daplykts kay sath ayk niy fharst lwtata haay۔yha sab sy pehlay fharst ko lght main tbdyl krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh fharst () knstrktr ka astamal karty hoey lght ko dwbarha fharst main tbdyl krta haay۔chwnkha lghat ki chabyan ki trtyb ko mhafwza rkhtay hain ، fharst aardarngh mhafwza haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythnlst = [3 ، 1 ، 4 ، 1 ، 5 ، 9 ، 2 ، 6 ، 5 ، 3 ، 5]mnfrd_lst = hataiyn_dawplykyts (ayl ays ty) prnt ("nklwn kay sath fharst ko hata diya gaya haay:" ، mnfrd_lst) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay ayl ays ty namy fharst ko kuch nmbrwn kay sath shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh LST kay sath hatanay_dawplykyts () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main mtghyr ko mnfrd_lst kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hata di hogi nkl kay sath fharst prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: daplykts kay sath fharst hata di ghiy: [3 ، 1 ، 4 ، 5 ، 9 ، 2 ، 6] is aaؤt pt ko un pt ki fharst main anasar kay trtyb ko mhafwza karty hoey nkl kay sath fharst dkhaiy ghiy۔

Question: kesi dyiay gaye nmbr tak fbwnyky tslsl ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn۔
Answer: azaghr main dyiay gaye nmbr tak fbwnyky tslsl ka hasab lghanay kay l we ، hum lwp ya tkrar ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: ayk lwp ka astamal: hum kesi dyiay gaye nmbr tak fbwnyky tslsl ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk lwp ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf fbwnyky (ayn): ayf aai by = [0 ، 1] jabky lyn (fb) <ayn: ayf aai by ۔pynda (ayf aai by [-1] + ayf aai by [-2]) rytrn fbhys fnkshn ayk antyjr ayn kay tawr par lyta haay۔an pt aur fbwnyky tslsl ki ayk fharst ko n tak lwtata haay۔as nay pehlay ayf aai by kay nam sy ayk fharst shrwa ki hay js main pehlay do fbwnyky nmbr hayn۔as kay bad ، is fharst main aakhry do nmbr shaml krkay aghlay fbwnyky nmbrwn ka hasab lghanay kay liye thwray dyr ka astamal krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh fbwnyky nmbrwn ki fharst lwtata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythn = 10fib_seq = fibonacci (n) prnt ("Fibonacci tslsl" tak "، n ،": "، Fib_seq) yeh prwghram pehli bar shrwa krta haay۔antyjr nay N ko 10 ki kymt kay sath fwn kya۔ phir ، yeh N kay sath Fibonacci () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko ayk mtghyr main astwr krta hay jsay Fib_seq kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey n tak fbwnyky tslsl prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 10: [0 ، 1 ، 1 ، 1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 5 ، 8 ، 13 ، 21 ، 34] tak fbwnyky tslsl] is aaؤt pt main fbwnyky tslsl ko un pt nmbr N tak dkhaya gaya hay js ka astamal karty hoey un pt nmbr N tak hasab kya gaya haay۔Fibonacci () fnkshn۔ tkrar ka astamal: hum kesi dyiay gaye nmbr tak Fibonacci trtyb ka hasab lghanay kay liye tkrar ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf faibwnyky (ayn): agar n <= 1: wapsy n awr: waps fybwnyky (N-1) + fibonacci (N-2) yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk add N la jata hay aur NTH nmbr ko waps krta haaytkrar ka astamal karty hoey Fibonacci trtyb.yha pehlay janch pratal krta hay keh aya un pt nmbr N 0 ya 1 haay۔ agar n 0 ya 1 hay tou ، fnkshn waps aajata haay۔aghr n 1 sy zayada hay tou ، fnkshn Fibonacci tslsl main N-1th aur N-2th nmbrwn ka mjmwaha waps krta haay۔yha woh jghha hay jahan tkrar karnay wali fnkshn kal waka hawty hay ، jahan fnkshn khud ko un pt N-1 aur N-2 kay sath kal krta haay۔ fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: pythonn = 10fib_seq = [fibonacci (i) I in Range (n))] prnt ("Fibonacci tslsl tk" ، N ، ":" ، fib_seq) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay 10 ki kymt kay sath N namy ayk add ka aaghaza krta haay۔ phir ، yeh Fibonacci () ko hr add kay sath 0 sy N- tak fwn krta haay۔1 fharst ki tfhaym ka astamal karty hoey un pt kay tawr par aur is kay ntyjay main ayk mtghyr ko FIB_SEQ kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey n tak fbwnyky tslsl prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 10: [0 ، 1 ، 1 ، 1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 5 ، 8 ، 13 ، 21 ، 34] tak fbwnyky tslsl] is aaؤt pt main fbwnyky tslsl ko un pt nmbr N tak dkhaya gaya hay js ka astamal karty hoey un pt nmbr N tak hasab kya gaya haay۔fibonacci () recursion kay sath kam krta hay

Question: bainry drkht ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas lkhyn aur is ki awnchaiy ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk tarykha nafza kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main bainry drkht ki nmaindghy karnay aur is ki awnchaiy ka hasab lghanay kay l we ، hum drkht main hr nwda ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye trynwda klas ki wzuahat krsktay hain aur poray drkht ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye drkht ki klas۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiytwnklas trynwda: dayf __init __ (khwd ، wyl): sylf.wal = wyl khwd۔): agar nwda koi nahin haay: waps 0 awr: baiyn_haait = sylf۔ haait (nwda۔ lyft) rait_haait = sylf۔ haait (nwda۔ rait) myks rytrn myks (baiyn_haait ، rait_haait) + 1 is par aml draamd ayk trynwda klas ki wzuahat krta hay ، aay۔baiyn bchha ، aur ayk dien bchha۔yha jra kay nwda kay sath ayk drkht ki klas ki bhi wzuahat krta haay۔awnchaiy () ka tarykha un pt kay tawr par ayk nwda lyta hay aur is nwda par jraay hoey sab try ki awnchaiy ko lwtata haay۔yha pehlay chyk krta hay keh nwda koi nahin haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، tarykha 0 lwtta haay۔ bsawrt dyghr ، yeh bar bar baien aur dien sbtryza ki awnchaiy ka hasab lghata hay aur zayada sy zayada awnchaiy kay alawha lwtata haay۔drkht.rwt = trynwda (1) drkht.rwt.lft = trynwda (2) drkht.rwt۔ rait۔ rait = trynwda (3) drkht۔5)# drkht ki awnchaiy = drkht ki awnchaiy ka hasab lghaiyn۔as kay bad ، yeh jra kay nwda kay sath drkht aabjykt ki awnchaiy () tarykha ko un pt kay tawr par kehty hain aur is kay ntyjay ko ayk mtghyr main awnchaiy kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey drkht ki awnchaiy prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، pydawar hawghy: drkht ki awnchaiy: 3 is aaؤt pt ko bainry drkht ki awnchaiy dkhaty hay js ka astamal drkht aabjykt ki awnchaiy () tarykha ka astamal karty hoey hawta haay۔

Question: nmbrwn ki fharst kay wsta ko tlash karnay kay liye kesi fnkshn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main nmbrwn ki fharst kay drmyany hasaay ko tlash karnay kay bohat sary tarykay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: aadadwshmar kay madaywl ka astamal: hum aadad wa shmar ki fharst kay awsta ko tlash karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay madaywl sy aadad wa shmar.mydyan () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythwnympwrt shmaryat dayf fainda_mydayn (ayl ays ty): rytrn shmaryat۔ mydaym (ayl ays ty) yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk fharst li ays ty lyta hay aur aadadwshmar ka astamal karty hoey fharst kay mydayn ko lwtata haay۔ astamal kya jaiay۔fnkshn: pythonlst = [3 ، 1 ، 4 ، 1 ، 5 ، 9 ، 2 ، 6 ، 5 ، 3 ، 5] mydayn = Find_median (LST) prnt ("fharst ka mydayn:" ، mydayn) yeh prwghram pehlay shrwa hawta haaykchh tadad kay sath ayl ays ty namy ayk fharst۔as kay bad ، yeh LST kay sath find_median () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mydayn namy mtghyr main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey fharst kay mydayn ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: fharst ka mydayn: 5 is aaؤt pt ko fainda_mydayn () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey un pt lst ka mydayn dkhata haay۔ nypy madaywl ka astamal karty hawiay: hum numpy.median () fnkshn ko numpy madaywl sy astamal krsktay hayn۔nmbrwn ki fharst ka awsta tlash karnay kay liay۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiythwnympwrt nympy btawr Question: kesi dyiay gaye tykst fail main hr lfza kay wakaat ko ghnnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main dyiay gaye tykst fail main hr lfza kay wakaat ko ghnnay kay l we ، hum fail ko prah saktay hain ، hr lkyr ko alfaza main tksym krsktay hain ، aur hr lfza kay wakaat ko ghnnay kay liye lght ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf ghnty_ wrdaza (fail nam): wrda_kaؤnt = {} awpn (fail ka nam ، 'aar') kay sath ayf kay tawr pr: f: alfaza main alfaza = lain.splt () alfaza main alfaza kay liay: agar wrda_kaؤnt main lfza: wrda_kaؤnt[wrda] += 1 awr: wrda_kaؤnt [wrda] = 1 rytrn wrda_kwnt yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par fail ka nam lyta hay aur fail main hr lfza ki mwjwdghy ki ghnty kay sath ayk lght waps krta haay۔yha pehlay ayk khaly lght ko shrwa krta hay jsay wrda_kaؤnt kehty hayn۔as kay bad ، yeh khly () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey fail khwlta hay aur fail main hr lain ko prahta haay۔yha hr ayk lfza kay zaryaay asplt () kay tarykha kar aur lwp ka astamal karty hoey hr lkyr ko alfaza main tksym krta haay۔aghr yeh lfza pehlay hi wrda_kaؤnt lght main hay tou ، is sy ghnty main azuafha hawta haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، is lfza ko lght main 1 ki ghnty kay sath shaml krta haay۔har lfza ka: ") lfza kay liye ، wrda_kaؤnt main ghnty kryn۔as kay bad ، yeh fail nam kay sath ghnty_ wrdaza () ko un pt kay tawr par fwn krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko wrda_kaؤnt namy mtghyr main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey fail main hr lfza kay wakaat ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: hr lfza ki mwjwdghy: yha: 1IS: 2AN: 1Example: 1File: 2to: 1Count: 1TE: 1OCCURTENSS: 1OF: 1of: 1 wrda: 1 wrda: 1 yeh aaؤt pt un pt fail main hr lfza ki mwjwdghy ko zaahar krta haayghnty_ wrdaza () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hasab kya gaya hay

Question: ayk fnkshn bnaiyn jo chyk krta hay keh aya do dawr ayk dusray kay anaghram hayn۔
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay bohat sary tarykay hain keh aya do dawr ayk dusray kay anaghram hain jo azaghr main hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: ayk lght ka astamal: hum tar main hr krdar ki tadd ko ghnnay kay liye ayk lght ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham do lghtyn tshkyl dy saktay hain ، hr ayk tar kay liye ayk ، aur hr krdar ki tadad ki ghnty kar saktay hayn۔aghr lghat brabr hain ، tou phir do asal dawr anaghram hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf aai ays_anghm (ays ty aar 1 ، ays ty aar 2): agar lyn (ays ty aar 1)! = lyn (ays ty aar 2): ghalat dakt 1 = {} dakt 2 = {} str1 main char kay liay: agar dakt 1 main char: dakt 1 [char] += 1 awr: DICT1 [CHAR] = 1 STR2 main CHAR kay liay: agar DICT2 main char: DICT2 [CHAR] += 1 awr: DICT2 [CHAR] = 1 rytrn dakt 1 == dakt 2 is fnkshn main do astrnghza STR1 aur STR2 ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay awraghr woh ayk dusray kay anaghram hain aur dusri sawrt main jhwtay hain tou schaiy lwttay hayn۔yha pehlay chyk krta hay keh aya dono dawrwn ki lmbaiy brabr haay۔as kay bad ، yeh do lghat aur dakt 2 ko tkhlyk krta hay takha dono tarwn main hr krdar ki frykwinsy ko ghnyn۔yha do tarwn main hr ayk krdar kay zaryaay khraa hawta hay aur isi lght main ghnty main azuafha krta haay۔aakhr main ، agar yeh dono lghat brabr aur ghalat hain tou yeh sch saabt hawta haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiyth astrn 1 = "aynghghram" str2 = "nghram" prnt (is_anagram (str1 ، str2)) # Truestr1 = "haylw"str2 = "wrlda" prnt (is_anagram (str1 ، str2)) # falsytys prwghram sab sy pehlay str1 aur str2 namy do tar ko kuch mtn kay sath shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh STR1 aur STR2 kay sath IS_ANAGRAM () ko un pt kay tawr par fwn krta hay aur prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntyjha ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: tryflsthys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh aya yeh do un pt dawr ayk dusray kay anaghram hain ya nhayn۔aghr trtyb dyiay gaye dawr brabr hain ، tou do asal dawr anaghram hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiythwndaf aai ays_anghrm (ays ty aar 1 ، ays ty aar 2): agar lyn (ays ty aar 1)! = lyn (ays ty aar 2): ghalat trtyb walay_str 1 = trtyb shuda (ays ty aar 1) trtyb shuda (str1) trtyb shuda (str2) rytrn sharted_str1 == sharted_str2th icstr2 btawr un pt aur waps aajata hay agar woh ayk dusray kay anaghram hain aur dusri sawrt main ghalat hayn۔yha pehlay chyk krta hay keh aya dono dawrwn ki lmbaiy brabr haay۔as kay bad ، yeh trtyb shuda () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dono dawrwn ko trtyb dyta hay aur drst lwtta hay agar trtyb shuda dawr msawy aur ghalat hain tou dusri sawrt myn۔ fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiyth astrn 1 = "aynghghram" str2 = "naghrm" prnt (is_anagram (str1 (str1)، str2)) # truestr1 = "haylw" str2 = "wrlda" prnt (is_Anagram (str1 ، str2)) # falsytys prwghram sab sy pehlay str1 aur str2 namy do tar ko kuch mtn kay sath shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh STR1 aur STR2 kay sath IS_ANAGRAM () ko un pt kay tawr par fwn krta hay aur prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntyjha ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: tryflsthys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh aya dono un pt dawr ayk dusray kay anaghram hain ya nhayn۔

Question: kesi msabt add main handswn ki rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk tkrar fnkshn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ayk msabt add main handswn ki rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye azaghr main ayk bar bar bar chlnay waly fnkshn ka nfaza: paiythndaf SUM_OF_DIGITS (N): agar N <10: wapsy N ELSE: wapsy N ٪ 10 + SUM_OF_DIGITS (N // 10) is fnkshnan pt kay tawr par ayk msabt antyjr ayn lyta hay aur tkrar ka astamal karty hoey apnay handswn ka mjmwaha waps krta haay۔yha pehlay janch pratal krta hay keh aya un pt nmbr N 10 sy kam haay۔ agar N 10 sy kam hay tou ، fnkshn waps aajata haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh N kay aakhry handsay ka mjmwaha aur N.HERE kay bkyha handswn kay sath fnkshn ko bar bar kal karnay ka ntyjha lwtata haay۔"، ayn ،": "، khlasaha main handsay) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay 12345 ki kymt kay sath N namy ayk add ka aaghaza krta haay۔ phir ، yeh N kay sath Sum_of_digits () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main mtghyr ko Sum kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey N main handswn ka mjmwaha prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 12345: 15 main handswn ka mjmwaha un pt nmbr N main handswn ka mjmwaha zaahar krta hay js ka astamal karty hoey SUM_OF_DIGITS () fnkshn ka astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: add ki di hogi fharst main sab sy bray mstkl rkm tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main dyiay gaye add ki fharst main sab sy bray mstkl rkm tlash karnay kay l we ، hum kdaanay kay alghwrthm ko astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiythwndaf myks_swbry_sm (ayl ays ty): myks_sm = ayl ays ty [0] mwjwdha_sm = ayl ays ty [0] rynj (1 ، lyn (ayl ays ty)) kay liay]) myks_sm = zayada sy zayada (myks_sm ، krnt_sm) wapsy myks_swmth fnkshn un pt ki haysayt sy ayk fharst lyta hay aur kdaanay kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey fharst main sab sy bray mstkl rkm waps krta haay۔yha pehlay fharst kay pehlay ansar main do mtghyr myks_sm aur krnt_sm ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh baky fharst main shaml hay aur mwjwdha andayks main khtm hony waly sbry kay zayada sy zayada jwraay ka hasab lghata hay js ka astamal farmwla mwjwdha_sm = myks (LST [i] ، krnt_sm + ayl ays ty [i]) ka astamal karty hoey hawta haay۔yha ab tak ki zayada sy zayada rkm kay sath myks_sm mtghyr ko bhi ap dayt krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh myks_sm mtghyr ko lwtata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythwnlst = [-2 ، 1 ، -3 ، 4 ، -1 ، 2 ، 1 ، -5 ، 4] myks_sm = myks_swbry_sm (LST) prnt("fharst main sab sy bray mstkl rkm:" ، myks_sm) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay ayl ays ty namy fharst ko kuch antyjrza kay sath shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh LST kay sath MAX_SUBARRAY_SUM () ko un pt kay tawr par fwn krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr main myks_sm kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey fharst main sab sy bray mstkl rkm prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: fharst main sab sy bray mstkl rkm: 6 is aaؤt pt myks_swbry_sm () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey un pt lst main sab sy bray mstkl rkm dkhata haay۔

Question: ayk ktaar ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas bnaiyn aur is kay tzaiyn wa aaraish aur dequeue tarykwn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr klas ka ayk msaal aml hay jo is kay enqueue aur dequeue tarykwn kay sath ktaar ki nmaindghy krta haay: paiytwnklas ktaar: Def __init __ (khwd): self.items = [] Def enqueue (khwd ، aaitm)dequeue (khwd): agar khud nhayn== 0 yeh aml draamd __init __ () kay sath ayk ktaar klas ki wzuahat krta hay js main aaitmza namy khaly fharst shrwa karnay kay liye tarykha ، ktaar kay akhttam par kesi shay ko shaml karnay kay liye ayk enqueue () tarykha ، ayk dequeue () tarykha ko khtm karnay aur waps karnay kay liye ayk dequeue () tarykhaktaar kay samnay ، aur ayk is_empty () tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh ktaar khaly hay ya nhayn۔ daykwi () ka tarykha chyk krta hay keh agar kesi shay ko khtm karnay sy pehlay ktaar khaly hay tw۔aghr ktaar khaly hay tou ، yeh ayk mnasb ghltay kay pygham kay sath ayk andayks ayrr athata haay۔ ktaar klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythwn kywiw = ktaar () ktaar۔ ankyw (1) ktaar۔ ankyw (2) ktaar۔ enqueue (3)prnt (ktaar.Dequeue ()) # 1 prnt (ktaar.Dequeue ()) # 2 prnt (ktaar.IS_EMPTY ()) # ghalat prnt (ktaar.Dequeue ()) # 3 prnt (ktaar.IS_EMPTY ()) # TRUETHIS prwghram pehlay ayk tkhlyk krta haayktaar klas ki msaal kay nam sy kaha jata haay۔as kay bad ، yeh enqueue () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ktaar main tyn aaitmwn ko tyar krta hay aur day kywi () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey un ko day kyw krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh chyk krta hay keh aya IS_EMPTY () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ktaar khaly haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 12false3Truethis aaؤt pt ktaar klas ka astamal karty hoey ktaar aabjykt par anjam di janay wali enqueue aur dequeue aapryshnza ko zaahar krta haay۔

Question: kesi fnkshn ko nafza karain jo chyk krta hay keh agar koi di hogi tadad ayk aham nmbr haay۔
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya koi dyiay gaye nmbr azaghr main ayk aham nmbr hay ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: ayk lwp ka astamal: hum yeh chyk karnay kay liye ayk lwp ka astamal krsktay hain keh aya rynj (2 ، N-1) main tamam nmbrwn par lwpngh krkay koi nmbr aham hay ya nhayn۔aghr hamain koi aysa ansar mil jata hay jo baky kay baghair N ko yksan tawr par tksym krta hay tou ، hum fwry tawr par yeh ntyjha akhza krsktay hain keh tadad aham nahin haay۔aghr hum nmbrwn ki pori rynj ko 2 sy la kar N - 1 tak kesi nmbr ki tlash kyay baghair N ko yksan tawr par tksym karty hain ، tou yeh tadad aham haay۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf aai ays_paim (ayn): agar n <2: rynj (2 ، ayn) main I kay liye jhwty lwt lwtyn (2 ، ayn): agar n ٪ i == 0: waps jhwty rytrn trwtys fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk addy n lyta hay aur sch waps aata haayaghr yeh ayk aham nmbr hay aur dusri sawrt main ghalat haay۔yha pehlay janch pratal krta hay keh aya un pt nmbr N 2 sy kam hay agar N 2 sy kam hay tou ، fnkshn ghalat lwtta haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh rynj (2 ، ayn) ki tamam tadad main ghhwmta hay aur chyk krta hay keh agar un main sy koi bhi baky kay baghair ayn ko yksan tawr par tksym krta haay۔aghr isy koi aysa ansar mil jata hay jo N ko yksan tawr par tksym krta hay tou ، yeh ghalat lwtata haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh schaiy lwtta haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythn = 17 prnt (is_prime (n)) # Truen = 20 prnt (is_prime (n)) # falsthys prwghram sab sy pehlay N ki kymt kay sath N namy ayk add ki abtda krta hay awr20. phir ، yeh IS_PRIME () ko N kay sath un pt kay tawr par fwn krta hay aur prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntyjha ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: try falsthys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh aya un pt nmbr ayk praim nmbr hay ya aai ays_ praim () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey is ka hasab nahin kya gaya haay۔ smpy madaywl ka astamal karty hawiay: hum smpy.sprym () fnkshn ko smpy madaywl sy la kar astamal krsktay hayn۔chyk karain keh aya koi nmbr praim hay ya nhayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: azaghr smpy ampwrt ISPrimedef is_prime (n): wapsy isprime (n) yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk add N ki zurwrt hay aur agar yeh ayk aham nmbr hay aur ghalat hay tou dusri sawrt main smpy.sprym () fnkshn ka astamal karty hawiay۔fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karain is ki msaal: paiytwn = 17 prnt (is_prime (n)) # TRUEN = 20 prnt (is_prime (n)) # falsytys prwghram sab sy pehlay N namy ayk add ki abtdaa 17 aur 20 ki kymt kay sath krta haay۔ phir ، yeh IS_PRIME ko fwn krta haay۔() N kay sath un pt kay tawr par kam karain aur prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntyjha prnt kryn۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: tryflsthys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh aya un pt nmbr ayk praim nmbr hay ya smpy madaywl sy aai ays_ praim () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey is ka hasab nahin lghaya gaya haay۔azaghr main bnyady nmbr

Question: ayk fnkshn bnaiyn jo ayk fharst ko ayk dyiay gaye tadad kay zaryaha dien taraf ghhwmta haay۔
Answer: azaghr main dyiay gaye ayk dyiay gaye mrahal kay zaryaha dien taraf fharst ko ghhmanay kay bohat sary tarykay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: slaisngh ka astamal: hum kesi dyiay gaye tadad kay zaryaha kesi fharst ko dien taraf ghhmanay kay liye slaisngh ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham fharst ko andayks lyn (LST) - K main do hasawn main tksym krsktay hain ، jahan K fharst ko ghhmanay kay liye Answer: yahan dyiay gaye nmbr kay hakykt ka hasab lghanay kay liye azaghr main ayk tkrar karnay waly fnkshn ka ayk msaal aml haay: pythndaf fyktwryil (ayn): agar n == 0: wapsy 1 awr: rytrn ayn * fyktwryil (ayn -1) is fnkshn main ayk msabt add lyta haayn btawr un pt aur tkrar ka astamal karty hoey is ki hakykt ko waps krta haay۔yha pehlay janch pratal krta hay keh aya un pt nmbr N 0 kay brabr haay۔ agar n 0 kay brabr hay tou ، fnkshn waps aajata haay۔ 1 bsawrt dyghr ، yeh N ki msanwaat aur N-1 kay sath fnkshn ko bar bar kal karnay ka ntyjha lwtata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal haay۔fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kryn: pythonn = 5 fykt = fyktwryil (n) prnt ("hakykt psnd" ، n ، ":" ، hakykt) yeh prwghram pehlay N namy ayk add ka aaghaza 5 ki kymt kay sath krta haay۔ phir ، yeh hakykt psndanha kehty hain (yha hakykt psnd hay () N kay sath un pt kay tawr par kam karain aur is kay ntyjay main ayk mtghyr ko hakykt main kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey N ki hakykt prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 5: 120 ki hakykt psndy sy yeh malwm hawta hay keh fyktwryl () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey un pt nmbr N ka hasab ktab kya jata haay۔ nwt karain keh bar bar fnkshn kalza ki wjha sy n ki bray akdar kay liye tkrar karnay wala fnkshn sst hawskta haay۔as tarah kay maamlat main ، bhatr hay keh hakykt psndy ka hasab lghanay kay liye tkrary nktaha nzar ya yaddasht ka astamal kryn۔

Answer: yahan ayk ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay waly ayk azaghr tabkay ki ayk msaal hay aur ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash karnay ka tarykha: paiytwnklas ghraf: dayf __init __ (khwd): sylf ghraf = {} dayf ayda_j (khwd ، yw ، wy): agar aap nahin haynsylf ghraf myn: sylf ghraf [u] = [] self.graph [u] .append (v) Def dfs (khwd ، shrwa ، dwrha = koi bhi nhayn): agar mlahazaha kya gaya tou koi nhayn: mlahazaha karain = syt () mlahazaha kryn۔(astart) prnt (astart) aghlay kay liay۔ ghraf [astart] - Question: do fharstwn kay mabyn mshtrkha anasar ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn۔
Answer: do fharstwn kay mabyn mshtrkha anasar ko tlash karnay kay liye yahan ayk msaal azaghr prwghram haay: paiythwndaf Find_common_elements (List1 ، List2): syt 1 = syt (lst 1) syt 2 = syt (lst 2) aam_aylmnt = syt 1. antrywrykshn (syt 2) rytrn lst (kamn_lymnts) yeh fnkshn lyta haay۔dw fharstyn lst 1 aur lst 2 ko un pt kay tawr par aur un kay mshtrkha anasar ki fharst lwtatay hayn۔yha pehlay syt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dono fharstwn ko syt main tbdyl krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh dono sytwn kay mabyn mshtrkha anasar ko tlash karnay kay liye chwrahaa () ka tarykha astamal krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh fharst () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey kesi fharst main waps aanay wali fharst main waps aajata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythwn lst 1 = [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] lst 2 = [3 ، 4 ، 5 ،6 ، 7] kamn_lymnts = find_common_elements (List1 ، List2) prnt ("aam anasar kay drmyan" ، lst 1 ، "awr" ، "، lst 2 ،": "، aam_aylmnt) yeh prwghram pehlay kuch antyjrza kay sath lst 1 aur lst 2 namy do fharstwn ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh Find_common_elements () ko lst 1 aur lst 2 kay sath fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main mtghyr ko aam_aylmnt kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey lst 1 aur lst 2 kay mabyn mshtrkha anasar ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، pydawar yeh hawghy: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] aur [3 ، 4 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7 ، 7] kay darmiyan mshtrkha anasar: [3 ، 4 ، 5] is aaؤt pt kay mabyn mshtrkha anasar ko zaahar kya gaya haay۔Find_common_elements () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey un pt ki fharstyn۔

Question: "yha chyk karnay kay liye kesi fnkshn ko nafza karain keh aya koi dyiay gaye tar ayk drst pylndarwwm hay ، ghair alfynwmrk krdarwn ko nzarandaza karty hawiay۔"
Answer: yeh chyk karnay ka ayk tarykha keh aya dyiay gaye tar ayk drst pylndarwwm hay ، ghair alfanwmyrk krdarwn ko nzarandaza karty hoey ، pehlay tamam ghair alfanwmrk krdarwn ko tar sy hatana hay aur phir chyk karain keh aya ntyjay main tar ayk pylndarwwm hay ya nhayn۔yhaan azaghr main ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf is_valid_palindrome (s): # ghair alfanwmyrk harwf ko hata dyn aur lwir kys ays = '' main tbdyl kryn۔ntyjay main strngh ayk pylndarwwm rytrn hay s == s [::-1] yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk tar lyta hay aur agar yeh ayk drst pylndarwwm hay tou ، ghair alfynwmrk krdarwn ko nzarandaza karty hoey ، aur dusri sawrt main jhwtay ko drst krta haay۔yha pehlay fharst ki tfhaym aur isalnum () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey strngh sy tamam ghair alfanwmyrk harwf ko hata dyta hay ، aur phir is kay ntyjay main hony waly tar ko lwir kys main tbdyl krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh janch pratal krta hay keh agar ntyjha khyza tar slaisngh aaprytr [::-1] ka astamal karty hoey is kay alt sy mwazanha krkay ayk pylndarwwm hay ۔yha fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr = "ayk aadmy ، ayk mnsawbha ، nhar:panama "drst = is_valid_palindrome (s) prnt (" IS "، s ،" ayk drst palindrome؟ "، drst) yeh prwghram sab sy phalay" ayk aadmy ، ayk mnsawbha ، ayk nhar: panama "ky kdr kay sath ays namy tar shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh IS_Valid_palindrome () ko ays kay sath un pt kay tawr par fwn krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko ayk mtghyr main astwr krta hay jsay drst kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt krta hay keh aya S prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ayk drst pylndarwwm haay۔as maamlay main ، pydawar hawghy: kya ayk aadmy ، mnsawbha hay ، ayk nhar: panama ayk drst pylndarwwm haay؟trytys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh aya un pt strngh ayk drst pylndarwwm hay ، ghair alfynwmrk krdarwn ko nzarandaza karty hoey ، is_valid_palindrome () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hasab kya jata haay۔ nwt karain keh yeh chyk karnay kay aur bhi tarykay mwjwd hain keh aya tar ayk drst pylndarwwm hay ، jesay ghair alfynwmrk krdarwn ko nzarandaza karty hain ، jesay keh ghair alfynwmrk krdarwn ko nzarandaza karty hain ، jysaybakaadghy sy azahaarat ka astamal karna ya do pwaintrza kay sath tar kay zaryaay tkrar krna۔

Question: ayk ktaar ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas bnaiyn aur is kay saiza aur is_empty tarykwn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ayk ktaar ki nmaindghy karnay aur is kay saiza aur isempty tarykwn ko nafza karnay wali ayk azaghr klas bnanay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl nfaza ko astamal krsktay hayn: paiytwnklas ktaar: Def __init __ (khwd): self.items = [] Def enqueue (khwd ، aaitm): sylf۔ aaitmza۔zumymha (aaitm) dayf day kywi (khwd): khud ko waps kryn۔aaitmza namy khaly fharst ko shrwa karnay kay liye __init __ () kay sath ayk ktaar klas ، ktaar kay akhttam par kesi shay ko shaml karnay kay liye ayk enqueue () tarykha ، ktaar main pehli shay ko hatanay aur waps karnay kay liye ayk dequeue () tarykha ،saiza () ktaar main mwjwd ashyaa ki tadad ko waps karnay ka tarykha ، aur yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh ktaar khaly hay ya nhayn۔is_empty () tarykha chyk krta hay keh agar aaitmza ki fharst ki lmbaiy 0 kay brabr hay aur agar yeh hay tou ، aur ghalat haay۔khaly؟ "، Q.IS_EMPTY ()) Q.enqueue (1) Q.enqueue (2) Q.enqueue (3) prnt (" ktaar ka saiza: "، Q.SIZE ()) prnt (" ktaar hay ktaar haaykhaly؟ "، Q.is_empty ()) Q.dequeue () prnt (" ktaar ka saiza: "، Q.Size ()) yeh prwghram pehlay Q namy ktaar klas ki ayk msaal bnata haay۔phr ، yeh chyk krta hay keh aya IS_EMPTY () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ktaar khaly hay aur prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntyjha prnt krty haay۔aghla ، is main enqueue () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ktaar main kuch ashyaa shaml krdy ghiyn۔as kay bad ، yeh saiza () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ktaar ka saiza haasal krta hay aur prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntyjha prnt krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh daykyw () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ktaar sy kesi aaitm ko hata dyta hay aur saiza () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey dwbarha ktaar ka saiza haasal krta hay aur prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntyjha ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، pydawar hawghy: kya ktaar khaly haay؟ktaar ka trusize: 3 kya ktaar khaly haay؟ktaar ka ghalat astamal kryn: 2 is aaؤt pt ktaar kay saiza ko zaahar krta hay aur chahaay woh khaly hay ya ktaar klas ka astamal karty hoey is ka hasab nahin lghaya gaya haay۔

Question: yeh chyk karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn keh aya do dawr ayk dusray ki ghrdsh hain ya nhayn۔
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya do dawr ayk dusray ki ghrdsh hain ya nahin ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: hum aahanghy ka astamal karty hawiay: hum pehlay tar ko khud sy jwra saktay hain aur phir chyk krsktay hain keh aya dusra tar knkytytda astrngh ka ayk strngh haay۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paithwndaf ARE_ROTATIONS (S1 ، S2): agar lyn (S1)! = lyn (S2): jhwty tymp = S1 + S1 lwtaiyn agar S2 tymp myn: waps schy dusri chyza: wapsy falthys fnkshn main do taryn S1 aur S2 lytay haynchwnkha un pt aur waps aajata hay agar woh ayk dusray ki ghrdsh aur ghalat hain tw۔yha pehlay chyk krta hay keh aya dono dawrwn ki lmbaiy brabr haay۔aghr woh brabr nahin hain tou ، yeh ghalat lwtta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh aarzuy tar bnanay kay l first khud sy pehli tar ko mthark krta hay js ko aarzuy tawr par kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh janch pratal krta hay keh aya dusra strngh un aaprytr ka astamal karty hoey tmp strngh ka ayk zakhyrha hay aur agar yeh hay tou ، aur ghalat haay۔drst = are_rotations (S1 ، S2) prnt ("hayn" ، S1 ، "awr" ، S2 ، "ayk dusray ki ghrdsh؟" ، drst) yeh prwghram pehlay kuch akdar kay sath S1 aur S2 namy do tar shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh S1 aur S2 kay sath AR_Rotations () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko ayk mtghyr kay sath astwr krta hay jsay drst kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt krta hay keh aya S1 aur S2 prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ayk dusray ki ghrdsh hayn۔as maamlay main ، pydawar hawghy: kya ayk dusray kay ABCD aur CDAB ghrdsh hayn؟trytys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh aya do un pt dawr ayk dusray ki ghrdsh hain jo AL_ROTATIONS () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hayn۔dwsra hasaha aur pehlay tar ka pehla hasaha۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf ARE_ROTATIONS (S1 ، S2): agar lyn (S1)! = lyn (S2): rynj (lyn (S1)) main I kay liye ghalat lwtaiyn: agar S1 [I:] + S1 [: i]== S2: hakyky wapsy falsytys fnkshn do dawr S1 aur S2 ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur agar woh ayk dusray ki ghrdsh aur ghalat hain tou woh sch saabt hawta haay۔yha pehlay chyk krta hay keh aya dono dawrwn ki lmbaiy brabr haay۔aghr woh brabr nahin hain tou ، yeh ghalat lwtta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh lwp aur chyk kay liye pehlay strngh kay asharywn kay zaryaay khraa hawta hay agar dusray hasaay aur pehlay tar ka pehla hasaha dusray tar kay brabr haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، yeh sch waps aajata haay۔aghr lwp mych dahwndaay baghair mkml hawjata hay tou ، yeh ghalat kam krta haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: azaghr 1 = "ABCD" S2 = "CDAB" drst = ARE_ROTATIONS (S1 ، S2) prnt ("hayn" ، S1 ، "awr "، ays 2 ،" ayk dusray ki ghrdsh؟ "، drst) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay kuch akdar kay sath S1 aur S2 namy do tar shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh S1 aur S2 kay sath AR_Rotations () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko ayk mtghyr kay sath astwr krta hay jsay drst kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt krta hay keh aya S1 aur S2 prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ayk dusray ki ghrdsh hayn۔as maamlay main ، pydawar hawghy: kya ayk dusray kay ABCD aur CDAB ghrdsh hayn؟trytys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh aya do un pt dawr ayk dusray ki ghrdshyn hain jo AL_ROTATIONs () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hasab ki jati hayn۔ dono aml draamd drst hain aur yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay keh aya azaghr main do tar ayk dusray ki ghrdsh hain ya nhayn۔

Question: tkrar ka astamal karty hoey kesi nmbr ki taakt ka hasab lghanay kay liye kesi fnkshn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: yahan tkrar ka astamal karty hoey kesi nmbr ki taakt ka hasab lghanay kay liye azaghr fnkshn ka ayk msaal aml haay: pythwndaf pawr (bys ، aykspyntr): agar aykspynt == 0: wapsy 1 alyf aykspynt == 1: wapsy ki bnyad: rytrn bys * pawr (bys * pawr (bys * pawr (bys)، akhraj knndha - 1) yeh fnkshn do dlail ki bnyad aur akhraj knndha lyta hay aur tkrar ka astamal karty hoey akhraj knndha ki taakt main athaiay hoey bys ki kymt ko lwtata haay۔yha pehlay janch pratal krta hay keh aya akhraj knndha 0 hay aur agar 1 hay tou 1 waps aajata haay۔phr ، yeh chyk krta hay keh aya akhraj knndha 1 hay aur agar yeh hay tou adaay ko waps krta haay۔aakhr main ، agar akhraj knndha 1 sy zayada hay tou ، yeh adaay aur aykspynt mains kay sath bar bar chlnay waly fnkshn ko kal karnay kay ntyjay main bys ko brahata haay۔pawr (bys ، aykspyntr) prnt (bys ، "taakt main athaya hoa ،" ، "،" hay "، ntyjha) yeh prwghram pehlay do mtghyrat ka aaghaza krta hay js ko bys aur aykspynt ko kuch akdar kay sath kaha jata haay۔as kay bad ، yeh un pt kay tawr par bys aur akhraj knndha kay sath pawr () fnkshn ko kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntyjha prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 5 ki taakt main athaya hoa 32 yeh aaؤt pt pawr () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hasab ktab kay hasab sy adaay ko brahanay ka ntyjha zaahar krta haay۔azaghr main tkrar ، bshmwl nypy laibryry ka astamal ya bainry nktaha nzar astamal krna۔

Question: tar sy tamam nkwl nkalnay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn۔
Answer: azaghr main tar sy tamam nklyn hatanay kay bohat sary tarykay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: ayk aardarda lght ka astamal karty hawiay: hum harwf kay trtyb ko mhafwza rkhtay hoey daplykyt ko tar sy nkalnay kay liye aardarda lght ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: azaghr kay klykshnza ampwrt aardardakt dayf ko hataiyn_daplykyts (zabanyn): waps ''. join (aardardakt.fwmkyza (ays)) yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk tar lyta hay aur tamam nklwn kay sath ayk niy tar waps krta hay jabky is kay aardar ko mhafwza karty hoey hata diya jata haay۔krdaryha sab sy pehlay aardarda dakt.fwmkyza () tarykha ka astamal karty hoey strngh sy ayk aardarda lght tyar krta hay ، jo krdarwn kay trtyb ko mhafwza rkhtay hoey nkl ko door krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh aardarda dakshnry ko jwain () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk tar main waps bdl dyta haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: azaghr = "haylw wrlda" ntyjha = hataiyn_dawplykyts (zabanyn) prnt ("daplykyt kay sath tar:" ، "،ntyjha) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay "haylw wrlda" ki kdr kay sath ays namy ayk tar ka aaghaza krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh ST kay sath hatanay_dawplykyts () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hata di hogi daplykyt kay sath ntyjay main tar prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: daplykyts kay sath tar ko hata diya ghya: haylyw WRDTHIS aaؤt pt haynda_dawplykyts () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ghnty kay hasab sy daplykyt kay ntyjay main hony wali tar ko zaahar krta haay۔ ayk syt ka astamal karty hawiay: hum tar sy daplykyt ko hatanay kay liye ayk syt ka astamal krsktay hain ، lekin yhatarykha krdarwn kay trtyb ko mhafwza nahin rkhta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiythndaf hataiyn_dawplykyts (zabanyn): wapsy ''yha sab sy pehlay syt () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey strngh sy ayk syt tyar krta hay ، jo nkl ko door krta hay lekin krdarwn kay trtyb ko mhafwza nahin rkhta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh jwain () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey syt ko waps astrngh main tbdyl krta haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: azaghr = "haylw wrlda" ntyjha = hataiyn_dawplykyts (s) prnt ("nkwl kay sath tar:" ، ntyjha) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay "haylw wrlda" ki kdr kay sath ays namy ayk tar ka aaghaza krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh ST kay sath hatanay_dawplykyts () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hata di hogi daplykyt kay sath ntyjay main tar prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: daplykyts kay sath tar ko hata
