Question: bainry srch try ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas lkhyn aur nwda dakhl karnay kay liye ayk tarykha nafza kryn۔
Answer: bainry srch try ki nmaindghy karnay aur nwda dakhl karnay kay liye ayk tarykha kar par aml draamd karnay wali ayk azaghr klas bnanay kay liye ، hum mndrjha zayl aml ko astamal krsktay hayn: azaghrklas nwda: dayf __init __ (khwd ، dayta): sylf۔ lyft = koi bhi nhayn۔= daytaklas bainry srch try: dayf __init __ (khwd): sylf.rwt = koi bhi dayf dakhl nahin (khwd ، dayta): agar sylf.rwt koi bhi nahin haay: sylf.rwt = nwda (dayta) awr: sylf ۔_ anrt (dayta ، sylf.rwt)dayf _ anrt (khwd ، dayta ، krnt_nwda): agar dayta <mwjwdha_nwda.dayta: agar mwjwdha_nwda.lft koi bhi nahin haay: mwjwdha_nwda.lft = nwda (dayta) dwsry: sylf ۔_ anrt (dayta ، krnt_nwda.ylft) aylf dayta> mwjwdha_nwda.dayta: agar mwjwdha_nwda. rait koi bhi nahin haay: mwjwdha_nwda۔ rait = nwda (dayta) awr: sylf ۔_ anrt (dayta ، krnt_nwda. rait) awr: prnt ("drkht main pehlay sy hi mwjwd haay۔") yeh aml draamd ayk kay sath nwda klas ki wzuahat krta haay۔knstrktr jo baien aur dien bchay kay nwdas aur nwda kay dayta ko shrwa krta haay۔yha ayk bainry srch try klas ki bhi wzuahat krta hay jo ayk knstrktr kay sath hay jo drkht kay jra nwda ko kesi ko bhi shrwa krta haay۔bainry srch try klas main ayk dakhl () tarykha bhi hawta hay jo un pt ki haysayt sy ayk kdr lyta hay aur isy drkht main dakhl krta haay۔ dakhl karain () tarykha pehlay chyk krta hay keh agar jra ka nwda koi nahin haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، yeh un pt wylyw kay sath ayk nya nwda tyar krta hay aur isy rwt nwda kay tawr par syt krta haay۔aghr rwt nwda koi nahin hay tou ، woh un pt wylyw aur jra nwda kay sath _INSERT () kay tarykha kar ko un pt kay btawr kal krta haay۔nwda ki kdr ki bnyad par nya nwda dakhl karnay kay liye sahayha pwzayshn tlash karnay kay liye _ anrt () ka tarykha drkht ko bar bar abwr krta haay۔aghr kymt pehlay hi drkht main mwjwd hay tou ، yeh ayk pygham prnt krta hay js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh kymt pehlay sy mwjwd haay۔ yahan bainry srch try klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwnbst = bainry srch try () BST.Insert (5) BST.Insert (3) BST۔dakhl karain (7) bst.insert (2) bst.insert (4) bst.insert (6) bst.insert (8) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay bainry srch try klas ki msaal bnata hay jsay by ays ty kehty hayn۔as kay bad ، yeh dakhl () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey drkht main kuch akdar dakhl krta haay۔as maamlay main ، pydawar yeh hawghy: drkht main pehlay sy hi kymt mwjwd haay۔ is aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh wylyw 5 pehlay hi drkht main mwjwd hay aur isy dwbarha dakhl nahin kya gaya tha۔ nwt karain keh yeh nfaza bainry srch try bnanay aur dakhl karnay ka sirf ayk tarykha haay۔as main ayk nwda۔bainry srch try ko nafza karnay kay liye aur bhi tarykay hain ، jesay nwdas ko tlash karnay aur hazaf karnay kay l an tkrary nktaha nzar ko astamal karna ya azuafy tarykwn ko nafza krna۔

Question: kesi dyiay gaye tar main krdarwn ko dharaiay baghair sab sy tawyl arwj tlash karnay kay liye kesi fnkshn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main dyiay gaye astrngh main krdarwn ko dharaiay baghair sab sy tawyl arwj tlash karnay kay l we ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: slaiydangh wndaw aprwch ka astamal: hum kesi dyiay gaye tar main krdarwn ko dharaiay baghair sab sy tawyl tr astrngh tlash karnay kay liye slaiydangh wndaw nktaha nzar ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham do pwaintrza ، astart aur aynda ka astamal karty hain ، mwjwdha astrngh kay aaghaza aur akhttam ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye ، aur mwjwdha sbstrngh main krdarwn ko tryk rkhnay kay liye ayk syt۔ham aakhry pwaintr ko dien taraf mntkl krsktay hain jab tak keh hamain ayk dharanay wala krdar nah milay ، aur phir astart pwaintr ko dien taraf mntkl karain jab tak keh hum dharanay waly krdar ko syt sy nah hataiyn۔ham is aml ko is wkt tak dhara saktay hain jab tak keh hum tar kay akhttam tak nah phanch jaiyn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf tawyl tryn_sbstrngh (s): shrwa = 0 akhttam = 0 myks_ lmbaiy = 0 chars = syt () jabky akhttam <lyn (s): agar s [end] chars main nahin haay: chars ayda (s [end]) akhttam += 1 zayada sy zayadha_ lmbaiy = zayada sy zayada (zayadha sy zayada ki lmbaiy ، akhttam - shrwa) awr: char.aymww (ays [astart]) astart += 1 rytrn myks_ lmbaiy is fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par strngh lyta hay aur harfwn ko dharatay hoey tawyl arsaay tak sab sy tawyl zakhyray ki lmbaiy waps krta haay۔slaiydangh wndaw aprwch ka astamal karty hoey tar myn۔yha pehlay astart aur aynda pwaintrza ko 0 ، myks_ lmbaiy mtghyr 0 ، aur charwn ko khaly syt par syt karnay ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh thwray dyr ka astamal karty hoey strngh kay zaryaay ghhwmta hay aur chyk krta hay keh agar aakhry pwaintr main mwjwdha krdar chars syt main haay۔aghr yeh nahin hay tou ، yeh krdar ko syt main shaml krta hay ، akhttamy pwaintr ko dien taraf la jata hay ، aur agar zurwry ho tou myks_ lmbaiy mtghyr ko ap dayt krta haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، yeh astart pwaintr kay krdar ko syt sy hatata hay ، astart pwaintr ko dien taraf mntkl krta hay ، aur is aml ko dharata hay jab tak keh mwjwdha krdar syt main nah haw۔aakhr main ، yeh myks_ lmbaiy mtghyr ko lwtata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: azaghr = "abkyb sy by by" ntyjha = tawyl tryn_sbstrngh (zabanyn) prnt ("harfwn ko dharanay kay baghair sab sy tawyl arsaha ki sbstrngh:" ، ntyjha) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay ayk strngh ko shrwa krta hay jsay ays kehty hayn۔"ABCABCBB" ki kdr kay sath۔as kay bad ، yeh un pt kay tawr par sab sy tawyl_substring () fnkshn ko fwn krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main ayk mtghyr kay ntyjay main ntaij ko astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey krdarwn ko dharaiay baghair tawyl trien sbstrngh ki lmbaiy prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: baghair kesi aazuaa kay tawyl trien sbstrngh: 3 is aaؤt pt tawyl arsaay tak sab sy tawyl slstrngh ki lmbaiy ko zaahar krta hay js main baghair kesi tawyl tryn_sbstrngh () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hasab ktab ko dharata haay۔ haysh tybl ka astamal karty hawiay: hum tryk rkhnay kay liye haysh tybl ka astamal krsktay hayn۔tar main hr krdar ka aakhry wakaha aur mwjwdha astrngh ka aaghaza۔ham strngh kay zaryaay lwp krsktay hain aur haysh tybl aur mwjwdha astrngh kay aaghaza ko zurwrt kay mtaabk ap dayt krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf tawyl tryn_sbstrngh (ays): astart = 0 myks_ lmbaiy = 0 aakhry_syn = {} rynj (lyn (ays)) kay akhttam kay liay: agar ays [akhttam] aakhry_syn aur lst_syn [ays [aynda]]> = astart: start = last_seen [s [end]] + 1 last_seen [s [end]] = akhttam myks_ lmbaiy = zayada sy zayada (myks_ lmbaiy ، akhttam - shrwa karain + 1) wapsy myks_ lmbaiy is fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par strngh lyta hay aur sab sy tawyl arsaha ki lmbaiy waps krta haayhaysh tybl ka astamal karty hoey tar main harwf ko dharaiay bghyr۔yha pehlay astart mtghyr ko 0 ، myks_ lmbaiy mtghyr 0 ، aur aakhry_syn haysh tybl ko khaly lght main shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh lwp kay liye A ka astamal karty hoey strngh kay zaryaay ghhwmta hay aur agar aakhry andayks main mwjwdha krdar aakhry_syn haysh tybl main hay aur agar is ka aakhry wakaha mwjwdha astrngh kay aaghaza kay bad haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، yeh kryktr pls 1 kay aakhry wakaay kay liye mwjwdha astrngh kay aaghaza ko ap dayt krta haay۔ phir ، yeh aakhry krdar aur is kay andayks kay sath aakhry_syn haysh tybl ko ap dayt krta hay ، aur agar zurwry ho tou zayada sy zayada lmbaiy mtghyr ko ap dayt krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh myks_ lmbaiy mtghyr ko lwtata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: azaghr = "abkyb sy by by" ntyjha = tawyl tryn_sbstrngh (zabanyn) prnt ("harfwn ko dharanay kay baghair sab sy tawyl arsaha ki sbstrngh:" ، ntyjha) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay ayk strngh ko shrwa krta hay jsay ays kehty hayn۔"ABCABCBB" ki kdr kay sath۔as kay bad ، yeh un pt kay tawr par sab sy tawyl_substring () fnkshn ko fwn krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main ayk mtghyr kay ntyjay main ntaij ko astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey krdarwn ko dharaiay baghair tawyl trien sbstrngh ki lmbaiy prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: harfwn ko dharanay kay baghair sab sy tawyl sbstrngh: 3 is aaؤt pt ko haysh tybl kay sath tawyl tryn_swbstrngh () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hasab ktab kay baghair dharaiay baghair tawyl arsaay tak sbstrngh ki lmbaiy dkhaty haay۔ dono aml draamd drst hain aur tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haayazaghr main dyiay gaye astrngh main harwf ko dharaiay baghair sab sy tawyl arwj

Question: kesi dyiay gaye jmlay main alfaza ki trtyb ko pltanay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn۔
Answer: azaghr main dyiay gaye jmlay main alfaza ki trtyb ko alta karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl aml ko astamal krsktay hayn: paiythwndaf rywrs_syntyns (jmlha): alfaza = jmlha۔ asplt () alt_ wrdaza = alfaza [::-1] alt_syntyns = "". join (alt_ wrdaza) rytrn alt_syntythys aml draamd ayk fnkshn ki wzuahat krta hay jsay rywrs_syntyns () kaha jata hay jo un pt kay tawr par ayk tar ka jmlha lyta hay aur jmlay main alfaza ki trtyb kay sath ayk nya tar waps krta haay۔yha sab sy pehlay asplt () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey alfaza ki fharst main jmlay ko tksym krta hay ، jo wait aspys harwf main tar ko alag krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh [::-1] slais aaprytr ka astamal karty hoey fharst main alfaza kay trtyb ko tbdyl krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh alfaza ki alt fharst main shaml hawta hay js main khlaiy krdar kay sath jwain () kay tarykha kar ko jdakar kay tawr par astamal karty hoey strngh main shaml hawta haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythnsyntyns = "yha ayk tyst jmlha haay" alt_syntyns = rywrs_syntyns ((rywrs_syntynsjmlha) prnt ("alt jmlha:" ، alt_syntyns) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay "yha ayk tyst jmlha haay" ki kymt kay sath jmlay kay nam sy ayk tar shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh un pt kay tawr par rywrs_syntyns () fnkshn ko jmlay kay sath kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr main tbdyl krta hay jsay alt_syntyns kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey alt alfaza kay aardar kay sath ntyjay main tar ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: alt jmlha: jmlay ki janch A yeh hay yeh aaؤt pt rywrs_syntyns () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hasab shuda alfaza ki trtyb kay sath ntyjay main hony waly tar ko zaahar krta haay۔ nwt karain keh yeh aml draamd yeh frzu krta hay keh jmlay main alfaza alag hawjatay hayn۔wait aspys harwf۔aghr is jmlay main awkaf ya dyghr ghair alfanwmrk krdar shaml hain tou ، woh alfaza main shaml hon ga aur is kay ntyjay ko mtasar krsktay hayn۔as maamlay ko snbhalnay kay l we ، hum jmlay ko alfaza main tksym karnay kay liye bakaadha azahaar astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: ayk fnkshn lkhyn jo mthark prwghramngh ka astamal karty hoey NTH Fibonacci nmbr lwtaiay۔
Answer: azaghr main mthark prwghramngh ka astamal karty hoey nwyn fbwnyky nmbr tlash karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl aml ko astamal krsktay hayn: paiythwndaf fbwnaky (ayn): fb_aaray = [0 ، 1] I main I kay liye (2 ، n + 1): fib_array.append (fib_array [i - 1] + fib_array [i - 2]) wapsy fib_array [n] yeh aml draamd fbwnyky () namy ayk tkryb ki wzuahat krta hay jo un pt kay tawr par ayk add N lyta hay aur mthark prwghramngh ka astamal karty hoey Nth fibonacci nmbr waps krta haay۔as nay pehlay Fib_array namy ayk fharst ko pehlay do fibonacci nmbr ، 0 aur 1 kay sath shrwa kya hay ، phir ، yeh lwp kay liye baky fbwnyky nmbrwn ko tkrar kay rshtay ka astamal karty hoey fharst main shaml karnay kay liye astamal krta hay [i] = fib_array [i-1] +fib_array [I-2]۔aakhr main ، yeh fharst kay nwyn ansar ko lwtata haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: paiythn = 10 ryzawlt = fbwnyky (ayn) prnt ("dy" ، ayn ، "wyn fbwnyky nmbr:" ، ntyjha) yeh prwghram pehlay is prwghram10 ki kymt kay sath N namy ayk antyjr ki abtdaa krta haay۔ phir ، yeh N kay sath Fibonacci () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur ntyjha ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey NTH Fibonacci nmbr prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 10 wain fbwnyky nmbr yeh haay: 55 is aaؤt pt ko mthark prwghramngh kay sath fbwnaky () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hasab krdha nwyn fbwnyky nmbr dkhata haay۔ nwt karain keh is aml draamd main O (N) ki wkt ki pychydghy aur ayk maawn haay۔O (n) ki khlaiy pychydghy ، jo O (2^n) ki wkt ki pychydghy aur O (n) ki maawn jghha ki pychydghy kay sath tkrar nktaha nzar sy bhatr haay۔mthark prwghramngh ka astamal karty hoey NTH Fibonacci nmbr tlash karnay kay l other dusray nktaha nzar bhi mwjwd hain ، jesay mymwraizayshn ya nchlay hasaay ka astamal۔

Question: mytrks zurb anjam denay kay liye ayk prwghram nafza kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main mytrks zurb anjam denay kay l we ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: nystda lwp ka astamal: hum mytrks kay hr saf aur kalm kay zaryaay tkrar karnay kay liye nysda lwp ka astamal krsktay hain aur isi anasar ki msanwaat ka hasab lghasktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiythndaf mytrks_mwltplykyshn (x ، y): ntyjha = [] I main I (lyn (x)) kay liay: ktaar = [] rynj main jay kay liye (lyn (Y [0])): rkm = 0 kay liayrynj main Kghhrylw lwps ka astamal krkay un pt aur lwtata haay۔yha pehlay ayk khaly fharst ka aaghaza krta hay jsay ntaij kehty hayn۔as kay bad ، yeh mytrks ki hr saf aur kalm kay zaryaay tkrar karnay kay liye tyn ghhrylw lwp ka astamal krta hay aur mtalkha anasar ki msanwaat ka hasab lghata haay۔as kay ntyjay main ROW namy ayk niy fharst main zakhyrha hawta hay ، jo ntaij ki fharst main shaml kya jata haay۔aakhr main ، yeh ntyjha ki fharst lwtata haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: paiytwnks = [[1 ، 2 ، 3] ، [4 ، 5 ، 6] ، [7 ، 8 ، 9]] y = [[[9]، 8 ، 7] ، [6 ، 5 ، 4] ، [3 ، 2 ، 1]] ntyjha = mytrks_mwltplykyshn (x ، y) prnt ("mytrks ki msanwaat x aur y:" ، ntyjha) yeh prwghram pehlay do mytrk ki abtda krta haaykchh akdar kay sath x aur y kaha jata haay۔as kay bad ، yeh X aur Y kay sath mytrks_mwltplykyshn () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey mytrk ki msanwaat ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: mytrks X aur Y ki msanwaat: [[30 ، 24 ، 18] ، [84 ، 69 ، 54] ، [138 ، 114 ، 90]] is aaؤt pt nay hasab shuda mytrk ki msanwaat ko zaahar kya haay۔nystda lwp kay sath mytrks_mwltplykshn () fnkshn ka astamalyhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: pythwnympwrt nympy btawr ayn py day ay ayf mytrks_mwltplykshn (ayks ، waiy): x = np.array (x) y = np.array (y) ntyjha = np.dot (x ، y) wapsy ka ntyjha۔ twlst () is fnkshnan pt kay tawr par do mytrks X aur y lyta hay aur nmy ka astamal karty hoey un ki msanwaat ko lwtata haay۔yha sab sy pehlay mytrks ko NP.Array () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey numpy safwn main tbdyl krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh mytrks ki msanwaat ka hasab lghanay kay liye NP.DOT () ka tarykha astamal krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh twlst () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey is ki fharst main waps aajata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiytwnks = [[1 ، 2 ، 3] ، [4 ، 5 ، 6] ، [7 ، 8، 9]] Y = [[9 ، 8 ، 7] ، [6 ، 5 ، 4] ، [3 ، 2 ، 1]] ntyjha = mytrks_mwltykshn (ayks ، waiy) prnt ("mytrks X aur Y ki msanwaat:"، ntyjha) yeh prwghram pehlay kuch akdar kay sath X aur Y namy do mytrk ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh X aur Y kay sath mytrks_mwltplykyshn () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey mytrk ki msanwaat ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: mytrks X aur Y ki msanwaat: [[30 ، 24 ، 18] ، [84 ، 69 ، 54] ، [138 ، 114 ، 90]] is aaؤt pt nay hasab shuda mytrk ki msanwaat ko zaahar kya haay۔nmy kay sath mytrks_mwltplykyshn () fnkshn ka astamal krna۔nmy ka nfaza aam tawr par braay mytrks kay liye tyza aur zayada mwsar hawta haay۔

Question: ayk astyk ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas bnaiyn aur yeh chyk karnay kay liye kesi tarykha ko nafza karain keh aya yeh khaly hay ya nhayn۔
Answer: yahan ayk paiywn klas ka ayk msaal aml hay jo astyk ki nmaindghy krta hay aur yeh chyk karnay kay liye kesi tarykha par aml draamd krta hay keh aya yeh khaly haay: pythwnklas astyk: dayf __init __ (khwd): khwd۔ aaitmza = [] Def is_empty (self): wapsy lyn (sylf۔ aaitm)== 0 is par aml draamd ayk knstrktr kay sath astyk klas ki wzuahat krta hay jo aaitmza namy khaly fharst ko shrwa krta haay۔astyk klas main ayk is_empty () tarykha bhi hawta hay jo astyk khaly hay (yany aaitmza ki fharst ki lmbaiy 0 haay) aur ghalat haay۔prnt ("kya astyk khaly haay؟" ، astyk۔ aaiys_pty ()) yeh prwghram pehlay astyk klas ki ayk msaal tyar krta hay jsay astyk kehty hayn۔as kay bad ، yeh astyk aabjykt par IS_EMPTY () kay tarykha kar ko kal krta hay aur prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntyjha prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، pydawar hawghy: kya astyk khaly haay؟trytys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh is_empty () ka tarykha sahayha tawr par shnakht krta hay keh astyk khaly haay۔ nwt karain keh yeh aml draamd astyk bnanay aur chyk karnay ka sirf ayk tarykha hay keh aya yeh khaly hay ya nhayn۔astyk ko nafza karnay kay aur bhi tarykay hain ، jesay lnkda fharst ka astamal karna ya anasar ko aaghay brahanay aur pap karnay kay l additional azuafy tarykwn ko nafza krna۔

Question: do nmbrwn main sy kam sy kam aam ayk sy zayada (LCM) tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main do nmbrwn main sy kam sy kam aam ayk sy zayada (LCM) tlash karnay kay l we ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: frkshn madaywl sy jy sy day fnkshn ka astamal: hum farmwla LCM (A ، B) = (A * B) // GCD ka astamal karty hoey do nmbrwn ka LCM tlash karnay kay liye frykshn madaywl sy GCD fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔(a ، b)yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: azaghr kay frkshn ko draamd GCDDEF LCM (A ، B): wapsy (A * B) // GCD (A ، B) yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par do add A aur B lyta hay aur jy sy day fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey un kay LCM ko waps krta haay۔frkshn madaywl۔as main LCM ka hasab lghanay kay liye farmwla LCM (a ، b) = (a * b) // gcd (a ، b) ka astamal kya jata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: pythwna = 12b = 14result = lcm (a ، b) prnt ("LCM aaf" ، A ، "awr" ، B ، "haay:" ، ntyjha) yeh prwghram pehlay kuch akdar kay sath A aur B namy do add ka aaghaza krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh LCM () ko A aur B kay sath un pt kay tawr par fwn krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey do nmbrwn kay LCM prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 12 aur 14 ka LCM IS: 84 is aaؤt pt main LCM () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey LCM () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey LCM ko dkhata haay۔jbkha do nmbrwn kay LCM ko bray tadad kay tamam zurbwn kay zaryaay tkrar krkay tlash karnay kay liye lwp jab tak keh hamain ayk sy zayada nah mil jaye jo chhwty tadad main bhi ayk sy zayada haay۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiythndaf LCM (A ، B): agar A> B: zayada = A awr: zayada sy zayada = B jabky sch haay: agar zayada sy zayada A == 0 aur zayada ٪ B == 0: lcm = zayada sy zayada bryk zayada + += 1 wapsy LCMTHIS fnkshn un pt kay tawr par do add A aur B lyta hay aur thwray dyr lwp ka astamal karty hoey apnay LCM waps krta haay۔yha pehlay chyk krta hay keh kon sy tadad zayada hay aur is nmbr par zayada sy zayada mtghyr ki abtda krty haay۔as kay bad ، is sy zayada kay tamam zurbwn kay zaryaay tkrar karnay kay liye thwray dyr ka astamal hawta hay jab tak keh is ko ayk sy zayada nah mil jaye jo chhwty tadad main bhi ayk sy zayada haay۔yha ntyjha ko LCM namy mtghyr main mhafwza krta hay aur isy waps krta haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythwna = 12 by = 14 ryzawlt = ayl sy aym (aay ، by) prnt ("ayl sy aym aaf" ، aay ، "awr" ، by ،"aaiy ays:" ، ntyjha) is prwghram main pehlay kuch akdar kay sath A aur B namy do add ka aaghaza hawta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh LCM () ko A aur B kay sath un pt kay tawr par fwn krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey do nmbrwn kay LCM prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 12 aur 14 ka LCM IS: 84 yeh aaؤt pt LCM () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey hasab krdha do nmbrwn kay LCM ko zaahar krta haay۔azaghr main do nmbrphala nfaza zayada mwsar hay aur frkshn madaywl sy jy sy day fnkshn ka astamal krta hay ، jabky dusra aml aasan hay aur thwray dyr ka astamal krta haay۔

Question: kesi fnkshn ko yeh chyk karnay kay liye nafza karain keh aya dyiay gaye strngh ayk drst IPv4 aydarys haay۔
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya dyiay gaye astrngh azaghr main ayk drst IPv4 aydarys hay ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: aai py aydarys madaywl ka astamal karty hawiay: hum aai py wy 4 aydarys ki twsayk karnay kay liye azaghr kay mayary laibryry sy aai py aydarys madaywl astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiytwnympwrt IPADDRESSDEF IS_Valid_IPV4_Address (aydarys): kwshsh kryn: IPADDRESS.IPV4Address (aydarys) IPaddress kay sawa sch waps kryn۔ AddressvalueError: wapsy falsyths fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk strngh aydarys lyta hay aur agar yeh ayk drst IPV4 ptha aur ghalat hay tou yeh sch haay۔aydarys ko drst karnay kay liye is main aai py ay day darys madaywl sy aai py wy 4 aydarys () ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔aghr ptha drst hay tou ، tarykha ayk IPv4Address aabjykt ko lwtata hay ، aur fnkshn drst lwtta haay۔aghr ptha drst nahin hay tou ، tarykha kar aydarys wylywiyrr astsanaa athata hay ، aur fnkshn ghalat ko waps krta haay۔ fnkshn ko astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythwn aydarys = "192.168.0.1" ntyjha = is_valid_ipv4_address (aydarys) prnt ("haay" ، aydarys، "ayk drst IPv4 aydarys؟" ، ntyjha) yeh prwghram pehlay "192.168.0.1" ki kymt kay sath aydarys namy ayk tar shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh IS_Valid_ipv4_address () ko aydarys kay sath un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt krta hay keh aya aydarys prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ayk drst IPv4 ptha haay۔as maamlay main ، pydawar hawghy: kya 192.168.0.1 ayk drst IPv4 ptha haay؟trytys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh is_valid_ipv4_address () fnkshn sahayha tarykay sy is ki nshandhay krta hay keh aydarys ayk drst IPv4 ptha haay۔ bakaadha azahaar ka astamal karty hawiay: hum IPv4 aydarys ko janch kar kay bakaadha azahaar ka astamal krsktay hain agar yeh shaml karnay ki had 0 main char aasharyha kay aadad wa shmar sy mmasal hay ya nhayn۔–255 ، nktawn sy algh.yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiythwnympwrt rydaf is_valid_ipv4_address (aydarys): pytrn = r "^((25 [0-5] | 2 [0-4] [0-4] [0-9] | [01]؟ [0-9] [0-9] [0-9] [0-9]9]؟) \.) {3} (25 [0-5] | 2 [0-4] [0-9] | [01]؟ [0-9] [0-9]؟.aydarys ko drst karnay kay liye yeh bakaadha azahaar ka nmwnha astamal krta haay۔pytrn jama rynj 0-255 main char aasharyha add sy myl khata hay ، jo daat kay zaryaha alag hawta haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythwna aydarys = "192.168.0.1" ntyjha = is_valid_ipv4_address (aydarys) prnt ("haay" ، aydarys ، "ayk drst IPv4 ptha؟ "، Question: dyiay gaye nmbr ka sab sy braa bnyady ansar tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn۔
Answer: kesi mkhsawsa nmbr ka sab sy braa bnyady ansar tlash karnay kay liye ayk azaghr prwghram ka ayk msaal aml haay: paiytwnympwrt ryazuy kay sab sy braay_paim_fyktr (n): myks_ praim_fyktr = 0 jabky n ٪ 2 == 0: zayada sy zayada 2 == 0: myks_prym_fyr = 2 ayn = ayn / 2 (I in rynj main I kay liye (MAX_PRIME_FARM_FARM_FARM_FARM_FAFICTOR = 2 N = N / 23 ، int (math.sqrt (n)) + 1 ، 2): jabky n ٪ i == 0: max_prime_factor = i n = n / i agar n> 2: myks_ praim_fyktr = n rytrn ant (myks_ praim_fyktr) yeh aml ayk fnkshn ki wzuahat krta haaysb sy braa_paim_fyktr () kaha jata hay jo un pt kay tawr par ayk add N lyta hay aur N ka sab sy braa bnyady ansar lwtata haay۔yha sab sy pehlay myks_ praim_fyktr namy mtghyr ki abtda krta haay۔ phir ، yeh N ko 2 kay zaryaha tksym karnay kay liye thwray dyr ka astamal krta hay jab tak keh yeh 2 kay zaryaha ab tksym nahin hawta hay ، aur myks_ praim_fyktr ko 2 main ap dayt krta haay۔aghla ، yeh lwp kay liye A ka astamal 3 sy la kar N kay mrba jra tak tamam ajyb tadad main tkrar karnay kay liye krta hay ، aur hr ajyb nmbr kay zaryaha N ko tksym krta hay jab tak keh is nmbr kay zaryaha ab yeh tksym nah haw۔aghr yeh N ka ansar hay tou yeh MAX_PRIME_FACTOR ko mwjwdha nmbr par ap dayt krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh myks_praim_fyktr ko ayk add kay tawr par lwtata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythn = 60 ryzawlt = sab sy braa_paim_fyktr (ayn) prnt ("" ، ayn ، "ka sab sy braa bnyady ansar" haay: "، ntyjha) yeh prwghram pehli bar shrwa hawta haayayk antyjr js ko N 60 ki kymt kay sath fwn kya jata haay۔ phir ، yeh N kay sath sab sy braa_paim_ fyktr () fnkshn un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey N ka sab sy braa bnyady ansar prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 60 ka sab sy braa bnyady ansar yeh haay: 5 is aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh sab sy braa_paim_fyktr () fnkshn sahayha tawr par is ki nshandhay krta hay keh 60 ka sab sy braa bnyady ansar 5 haay۔ nwt karain keh is aml ko lwp aur lwp kay liye ayk wkt astamal hawta haay۔N kay awaml kay zaryaay tkrar karnay aur chyk karnay kay liye keh aya woh wzayr aazam hayn۔ksy tadad kay sab sy braay bnyady ansar ko tlash karnay kay l other aur bhi nktaha nzar mwjwd hain ، jesay recursion ya eratustshenes ki chhlny astamal krna۔

Question: srklr sy mnslk fharst ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas lkhyn aur shrwa main nwda dakhl karnay kay liye ayk tarykha nafza kryn۔
Answer: yahan ayk azaghr klas ki ayk msaal hay jo srklr sy mnslk fharst ki nmaindghy krty hay aur shrwa main nwda dakhl karnay kay liye ayk tarykha kar par aml draamd krty haay: paiythnklas nwda: dayf __init __ (khwd ، dayta): sylf daat dayta = dayta nykst = nwn klas srklr lnkda lst: dayf __ __init__(khwd): khud nhayn۔mwjwdha۔ nykst! = sylf hayda: krnt = krnt۔ nykst krnt۔ nykst = nya_nwda nya_nwda.nykst = sylf hayda syl۔ hayda = nya_nwdatys aml draamd ayk knstrktr kay sath ayk nwda klas ki wzuahat krta hay jo dayta praprty aur aghly praprty ka aaghaza krta hay jo pwaints ki shrwaat krta haay۔fharst main aghlay nwda pr۔as aml main ayk srklr lnkda lst klas ki bhi wzuahat ki hogi hay js main ayk knstrktr kay sath hayda praprty shrwa nahin ki jati haay۔srklr lnkda lst klas main ayk dakhl_at_byghynngh () tarykha bhi hawta hay jo dayta pyramytr lyta hay aur srklr sy mnslk fharst kay aaghaza main dyiay gaye dayta kay sath ayk nya nwda dakhl krta haay۔aghr fharst khaly hay tou ، nya nwda sr bn jata hay ، aur is ki aghly praprty khud hi asharha krty haay۔aghr fharst khaly nahin hay tou ، aakhry nwda tlash karnay kay l the is tarykha kar ki fharst kay zaryaay tkrar krta hay aur is ki aghly praprty ko niay nwda ki taraf asharha karnay kay liye ap dayt krta haay۔niy nwda ki aghly praprty sr ki taraf asharha krty hay ، aur sr ko niay nwda ki taraf asharha karnay kay liye ap dayt kya jata haay۔ srklr lnkda lst klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythwnklst = srklr lnkda lst () clist.insert_at_beginning (1) clist.insert_at_beginning (2)clist.insert_at_beginning (3) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay srklr lnksyda lst klas ki ayk msaal tkhlyk krta hay jsay klst kehty hayn۔as kay bad ، yeh srklr lnkda lst kay aaghaza main tyn nwdas dakhl karnay kay liye mkhtlf akdar kay sath klyst par INSERT_AT_BEGINNNING () ka tarykha krar dyta haay۔ nwt karain keh is aml sy yeh frzu kya gaya hay keh srklr sy mnslk fharst akylay mnslk haay۔aghr srklr lnkda fharst dwghna mnslk hay tou ، hamain nwdas ki praprty praprty ko bhi ap dayt karnay ki zurwrt haay۔

Question: do fharstwn ka chwrahaa tlash karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main do fharstwn ka chwrahaa tlash karnay kay l we ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: syt chwrahaay ka astamal: hum do fharstwn ka chwrahaa tlash karnay kay liye blt un syt chwrahaay ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiythndaf chwrahaa (lst 1 ، lst 2): syt 1 = syt (lst 1) syt 2 = syt (lst 2) rytrn lst (syt 1.trysykshn (syt 2)) yeh fnkshn do fharstwn ki fharst 1 aur lst 2 ko un pt kay tawr par lwtata hay aur apnay chwrahaay ko waps krta hay aur un kay chwrahaay ko waps krta hay aur un kay chwrahaay ko waps krta haay۔chwrahaay ka tarykha۔yha pehlay syt () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey fharstwn ko syt main tbdyl krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh dono sytwn kay mabyn mshtrkha anasar ko tlash karnay kay liye chwrahaa () ka tarykha astamal krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh fharst () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kesi fharst main waps bdlta haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiytwn lst 1 = [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] lst 2 = [4 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7، 8] ntyjha = chwrahaa (lst 1 ، lst 2) prnt ("chwrahaa" ، lst 1 ، "awr" ، lst 2 ، "haay:" ، ntyjha) yeh prwghram pehlay kuch akdar kay sath lst 1 aur lst 2 namy do fharstwn ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh chwrahaa () ko lst 1 aur lst 2 kay sath un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dono fharstwn kay chwrahaay prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] aur [4 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7 ، 8] ka chwrahaa yeh haay: [4 ، 5] is aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh chwrahaa () fnkshn () fnkshndwnwn fharstwn kay mabyn mshtrkha anasar ki sahayha tawr par nshandhay krta haay۔ fharst ki tfhaym ka astamal: hum ayk fharst kay anasar kay zaryaay tkrar krkay do fharstwn ka chwrahaa tlash karnay kay liye ayk fharst ki tfhaym ka astamal krsktay hain aur janch pratal karty hain keh aya woh dusri fharst main mwjwd hain ya nhayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiytndaf chwrahaa (fharst 1 ، fharst 2): wapsy [fharst 1 main ansar kay liye ansar agar ansar 2 main ansar] yeh fnkshn do fharstwn ki fharst 1 aur lst 2 ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur fharst ki tfhaym ka astamal karty hoey un kay chwrahaay ko waps krta haay۔aghr woh lst 2 main mwjwd hain tou yeh lst 1 aur chyk kay anasar kay zaryaay tkrar krta haay۔aghr koi ansar dono fharstwn main mwjwd hay tou ، is ko aaؤt pt lst main shaml kya gaya haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiytwn lst 1 = [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] lst 2 = [4 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7، 8] ntyjha = chwrahaa (lst 1 ، lst 2) prnt ("chwrahaa" ، lst 1 ، "awr" ، lst 2 ، "haay:" ، ntyjha) yeh prwghram pehlay kuch akdar kay sath lst 1 aur lst 2 namy do fharstwn ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh chwrahaa () ko lst 1 aur lst 2 kay sath un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dono fharstwn kay chwrahaay prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] aur [4 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7 ، 8] ka chwrahaa yeh haay: [4 ، 5] is aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh chwrahaa () fnkshn () fnkshndwnwn fharstwn kay mabyn mshtrkha anasar ki sahayha tawr par nshandhay krta haay۔ dono aml draamd drst hain aur azaghr main do fharstwn kay chwrahaay ko tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔phala nfaza zayada mwsar hay aur syt chwrahaay ka tarykha astamal krta hay ، jabky dusra nfaza ayk fharst ki tfhaym ka astamal krta haay۔

Question: dyiay gaye lmbaiy ka bay trtyb pas wrda tyar karnay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn۔
Answer: azaghr main dyiay gaye lmbaiy ka bay trtyb pas wrda tyar karnay kay l we ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: strngh madaywl ka astamal: hum harwf kay pehlay sy taay shuda syt sy harwf ko mntkhb krkay bay trtyb pas wrda tyar karnay kay liye strngh madaywl ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiytwnympwrt ryndam ampwrt strngh dayf jnryt_ pas wrda (lmbaiy): khta = strngh.asky_lytrza handsay = strngh.dayjts ki alamtyn = strngh۔lmbaiy)) rytrn pas wrda yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk add lmbaiy lyta hay aur mkhsawsa lmbaiy ka bay trtyb pas wrda lwtata haay۔as main pehlay tyn mtghyrat ka aaghaza hawta hay jsay khtawta ، handswn aur alamtwn ko khtawta ، handswn ، aur strngh madaywl main byan krdha alamtwn kay syt kehty hayn۔as kay bad ، is main ayk fharst ki tfhaym aur bay trtyb۔ chwais () ka tarykha astamal kya gaya hay takha khtawta ، handswn aur alamtwn kay mshtrkha syt sy bay trtyb harwf ko mntkhb kya jaskay۔aakhr main ، yeh mntkhb krdha harwf ko ayk tar main shaml krta hay aur isy lwtata haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythwnlnth = 10 pas wrda = jnryt_ pas wrda (lmbaiy) prnt ("lmbaiy ka bay trtyb pas wrda" ، lmbaiy ، "haay:" ، pas wrda)yha prwghram pehlay 10 ki kymt kay sath lmbaiy kay nam sy ayk antyjr ki abtda krta haay۔ phir ، yeh lmbaiy kay sath jnryt_ pas wrda () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main mtghyr ko pas wrda kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey bay trtyb pas wrda prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: lmbaiy 10 ka bay trtyb pas wrda yeh haay: 8J! 2G#7x $ zthis aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh jnryt_ pas wrda () fnkshn sahayha tawr par mkhsawsa lmbaiy ka bay trtyb pas wrda tyar krta haay۔ sykryt madaywl ka astamal: hum astamal krsktay hayn۔khfyha madaywl ayk khfyha nghary sy mhafwza bay trtyb pas wrda tyar karnay kay liay۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythwnympwrt sykrytsm pwrt strngh dayf jnryt_ pas wrda (lmbaiy): harf thajy = strngh.asky_lytrza + strngh.dayjts + strngh۔an pt kay tawr par ayk antyjr lmbaiy lyta hay aur mkhsawsa lmbaiy ka ayk khfyha nghary sy mhafwza bay trtyb pas wrda waps krta haay۔yha sab sy pehlay harf ، handswn ، aur strngh madaywl main byan krdha alamtwn kay syt kay sath harf thajy namy mtghyr ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad ، is main ayk fharst ki tfhaym aur raza astamal kya jata haay۔ harfy syt sy bay trtyb harfwn ko kryptwghrafk tawr par mhafwza karnay kay liye antkhab () ka tarykha۔aakhr main ، yeh mntkhb krdha harwf ko ayk tar main shaml krta hay aur isy lwtata haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythwnlnth = 10 pas wrda = jnryt_ pas wrda (lmbaiy) prnt ("lmbaiy ka bay trtyb pas wrda" ، lmbaiy ، "haay:" ، pas wrda)yha prwghram pehlay 10 ki kymt kay sath lmbaiy kay nam sy ayk antyjr ki abtda krta haay۔ phir ، yeh lmbaiy kay sath jnryt_ pas wrda () fnkshn ko un pt kay tawr par kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main mtghyr ko pas wrda kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey bay trtyb pas wrda prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: lmbaiy 10 ka bay trtyb pas wrda yeh haay: 8J! 2G#7x $ ZTHIS aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh jnryt_ pas wrda () fnkshn sahayha tawr par ayk mkhsawsa lmbaiy ka ayk khfyha nghary sy mhafwza bay trtyb pas wrda tyar krta haay۔azaghr main di hogi lmbaiy ka bay trtyb pas wrda tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔phala nfaza strngh aur bay trtyb madaywlza ka astamal krta hay ، jabky dusra nfaza strngh aur raza madaywl astamal krta haay۔

Question: yeh chyk karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn keh aya ayk dyiay gaye nmbr ayk kaml mrba haay۔
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya koi dyiay gaye nmbr azaghr main ayk bhatryn mrba hay ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: ryazuy kay madaywl ka astamal: hum ryazuy kay madaywl sy ISQRT () fnkshn astamal krsktay hain takha yeh malwm kya jaskay keh koi nmbr ayk kaml mrba hay ya nhayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiytwnympwrt myth dayf IS_PERFECT_SQUARE (nmbr): rwt = ryazuy۔ ISQRT (nmbr) rytrn rwt * rwt * rwt == nmbr yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk add nmbr lyta hay aur agar yeh ayk bhatryn mrba aur ghalat hay tou yeh sch haay۔yha nmbr kay addy mrba jra ka hasab lghanay kay liye ryazuy kay madaywl sy ISQRT () fnkshn ka astamal krta haay۔phr ، yeh chyk krta hay keh aya antyjr askwair rwt ka mrba asal nmbr kay brabr haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، nmbr ayk kaml mrba hay ، aur fnkshn sch waps aajata haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، fnkshn ghalat ko lwtata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythn nmbr = 25 ryzawlt = is_perfect_square (nmbr) prnt ("IS" ، nmbr ، "ayk kaml mrba؟" ، ntyjha) yeh prwghram pehlay ayk antyjr namy nmbr shrwa krta hay js main nmbr kaha jata haay۔25 ki kymt kay sath۔ phir ، yeh IS_PERFECT_SQUARE () fnkshn ko nmbr kay sath fwn krta hay aur un pt kay tawr par is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt krta hay keh aya prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey nmbr ayk bhatryn mrba hay ya nhayn۔as maamlay main ، pydawar hawghy: kya 25 ayk kaml mrba haay؟trytys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh is_perfect_square () fnkshn sahayha tarykay sy is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh 25 ayk kaml mrba haay۔ antyjr dawyzen ka astamal: hum yeh chyk karnay kay liye antyjr dawyzen ka astamal krsktay hain keh aya nmbr kay 1 sy mrba rwt tak tamam add kay zaryaay tkrar krkay koi nmbr ayk bhatryn mrba hay ya nhayn۔awr yeh chyk karna keh aya un ka mrba asal nmbr kay brabr haay۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf IS_PERFECT_SQUARE (nmbr): rynj main Isch hay agar yeh ayk kaml mrba aur ghalat haay۔yha lwp kay liye A ka astamal 1 sy la kar nmbr kay mrba jra tak tamam add kay zaryaay tkrar karnay kay liye krta haay۔phr ، yeh chyk krta hay keh aya mwjwdha addy ka mrba asal nmbr kay brabr haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، nmbr ayk kaml mrba hay ، aur fnkshn sch waps aajata haay۔aghr lwp kaml mrba ki tlash kyay baghair mkml hawjata hay tou ، fnkshn ghalat ko lwtata haay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaiay: paiythn nmbr = 25 ryzawlt = is_perfect_square (nmbr) prnt ("IS" ، nmbr ، "ayk kaml mrba؟" ، ntyjha)yha prwghram sab sy pehlay 25 ki kymt kay sath nmbr namy ayk antyjr ki abtda krta haay۔ phir ، yeh IS_PERFECT_SQUARE () fnkshn ko nmbr kay sath fwn krta hay aur un pt kay tawr par is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt krta hay keh aya prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey nmbr ayk bhatryn mrba hay ya nhayn۔as maamlay main ، pydawar hawghy: kya 25 ayk kaml mrba haay؟trytys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh is_perfect_square () fnkshn sahayha tawr par is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh 25 ayk kaml mrba haay۔ dono aml draamd drst hain aur yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta Question: blbla trtyb waly alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey addywn ki fharst ko trtyb denay kay liye ayk prwghram ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: blbla trtyb waly alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey addywn ki fharst ko trtyb denay kay liye ayk azaghr prwghram ki ayk msaal kay nfaza: paiythndaf blbla_swrt (nmbr): ayn = lyn (nmbr) kay liye I (n) ki had (n) kay liye (n - i - 1 - 1): agar nmbr [j]> nmbr [j + 1]: nmbr [j] ، nmbr [j + 1] = nmbr [j + 1] ، nmbr [j] wapsy nmbr yeh aml draamd blbl_swrt () namy ayk tkryb ki wzuahat krta haay۔an pt kay tawr par addy nmbrwn ki ayk fharst aur blbla trtyb waly alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey trtyb shuda fharst ko lwtata haay۔yha pehlay fharst ki lmbaiy main N namy mtghyr ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad ، is fharst main mlhakha anasar kay tamam jwraay kay zaryaay tkrar kay l lo lwp kay liye do ghhwnsla astamal krta haay۔har jwray kay l it ، yeh chyk krta hay keh aya pehla ansar dusray ansar sy zayada hay ya nhayn۔aghr yeh hay tou ، yeh anasar ko tbdyl krta haay۔tmam tkrar ko mkml karnay kay bad ، fnkshn trtyb shuda fharst ko lwtata haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: paiythwnnmbrza = [5 ، 3 ، 8 ، 6 ، 7 ، 2] ntyjha = blbla_swrt (nmbr) prnt ("trtyb shuda fharst haay:"، ntyjha) yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay kuch akdar kay sath nmbr namy fharst ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh blbla_swrt () ko un pt kay tawr par nmbr kay sath fnkshn kehty hain aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr karty hayn۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey trtyb shuda fharst prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: trtyb shuda fharst yeh hay kha: [2 ، 3 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7 ، 8] is aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh blbl_swrt () fnkshn blbl trtyb waly alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey antyjrza ki fharst ko sahayha tarykay sy trtyb dyta haay۔blbla trtyb waly alghwrthm main O (n^2) ki wkt ki pychydghy hawty hay ، jo isy bray fharstwn kay liye ghair mwsar bna dyta haay۔bhatr wkt ki pychydghy kay sath dyghr chhantnay waly alghwrthm hain ، jesay kwikswrt aur anzumam ، jo bray fharstwn kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔

Question: hadayt namha ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas bnaiyn aur chwraaiy ki pehli tlash karnay kay liye ayk tarykha nafza kryn۔
Answer: ayk hadayt shuda ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay waly ayk azaghr klas bnanay aur chwraaiy ki pehli tlash karnay kay liye ayk tarykha kar par aml draamd karnay kay l we ، hum nyt wrk ayks madaywl sy ghraf klas aur by ayf ays () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: Pythonimport nyt wrk ayks btawr Nxclass hadayt namha: Def __init __ (khwd): sylf ghraf = nx.digraph () def add_edge (khwd ، u ، v): sylf.ghraf.day ghraf.dayj (yw ، wy) dayf by ayf ays (khwd، shrwa kryn): mlahazaha karain = [] ktaar = [shrwa] jabky ktaar: nwda = ktaar.pwp (0) agar nwda main nahin mlahazaha kya ghya: mlahazaha kya ghya۔: ktaar۔ apynda (prawsy) wapsy ka dwrha is par aml draamd daairykt ghraf namy ayk klas ki wzuahat krta hay jo hadayt waly ghraf ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as main ayk knstrktr hay jo nyt wrk ayks madaywl sy dayghraf () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey khaly hadayt namha ghraf ki abtda krta haay۔as main ADD_EDGE () namy ayk tarykha bhi hay jo do nwdas U aur V ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur nyt wrk ayks madaywl sy ADD_EDGE () tarykha ka astamal karty hoey ghraf main U sy V tak hadayt shuda knaray ka azuafha krta haay۔aakhr main ، is main BFS () namy ayk tarykha hay jo un pt kay tawr par shrwaaty nwda astart lyta hay aur shrwa sy shrwa hony waly ghraf par chwraaiy ki pehli tlash krta haay۔as main ayk fharst ka astamal kya gaya hay js ka nam dwrha nwdas ka tryk rkhnay kay liye kya gaya hay aur chwraaiy ki pehli tlash kay alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay liye ktaar namy ayk fharst۔yha wzat shuda nwdas ki fharst lwtata haay۔ yahan klas ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: azaghrghraf = daairykt ghraf () ghraf.aday_j (1 ، 2) ghraf.aday_j (1 ، 3) ghraf.aday_j (2 ، 4) ghraf.j_j_j_j۔.as kay bad ، yeh ADD_EDGE () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ghraf main kuch knarwn ka azuafha krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh 1 kay abtdaiy nwda kay sath BFS () kay tarykha kar ko kal krta hay aur ntyjha ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ntyjha prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: by ayf ays trywrsl nwda 1 sy shrwa ho raha haay: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] is aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh by ayf ays () ka tarykha nwda sy shrwa hony waly hadayt namha ghraf par sahayha tawr par chwraaiy ki pehli tlash krta haay۔1 aur mlahazaha ki hogi nwdas ki fharst waps krta haay۔ nwt karain keh is par aml draamd nyt wrk ayks madaywl ka astamal krta hay ، jo azaghr main blt un madaywl nahin hay aur isy alag sy anstal karnay ki zurwrt haay۔as ko anstal karnay kay l you ، aap mndrjha zayl kmanda astamal krsktay hayn: PIP nyt wrk ayksylynty kay sath anstal karain ، aap ktaar kay dayta dahanchay ka astamal karty hoey BFS () kay tarykha kar ko nafza krsktay hain aur mlahazaha karnay waly nwdas ka sragh lghanay kay liye ayk lght ، jesa keh tlash kay kuch ntaij main byan kya gaya haay۔taham ، nyt wrk ayks madaywl azaghr main ghraf kay sath kam karnay ka ayk zayada aasan aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: kesi dyiay gaye tar main srwn ki tadad ghnnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: azaghr main dyiay gaye tar main harfwn ki tadad ko ghnnay kay l we ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: ayk lwp ka astamal aur agar byan: hum tar main hr krdar srza = "aeiouaeiou" ghnty = 0 astrngh main char kay liay: agar srwn main char: ghnty += 1 rytrn kaؤnty un pt kay tawr par ayk tar tar lyta hay aur is main harfwn ki tadad ko waps krta hay awrtaryha chyk krta hay keh aya yeh IF byan aur aaprytr main astamal krkay harf haay۔aghr krdar ayk harf hay tou ، is sy ghnty mtghyr main azuafha hawta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh srwn ki ghnty ko lwtata haay۔ yahan Question: dyiay gaye add ko alt karnay kay liye kesi fnkshn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: azaghr main dyiay gaye add ko alta karnay kay l we ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: strngh hayra phyry ka astamal: hum antyjr ko tar main tbdyl krsktay hain ، tar ko alta krsktay hain ، aur phir isy waps kesi add main tbdyl krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf rywrs_tyjr (nmbr): strngh = ays ty aar (aay by ays (nmbr)) alt_strngh = strngh [:: -1] alt_nmbr = ant (alt_strngh) wapsy alt_nmbr agar nmbr> = 0 aur -rywrsda_nbrthys fnkshn ayk addy nmbr lyta haay۔jysa keh un pt aur alt antyjr ko lwtata haay۔yha sab sy pehlay antyjr ki mtalk kymt ko ays ty aar () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey astrngh main tbdyl krta haay۔as kay bad ، yeh tar ko pltanay kay liye strngh slaisngh ka astamal krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh alt strngh ko ant () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kesi add main tbdyl krta hay aur asal alamt kay sath ntyjha lwtata haay۔ fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythn nmbr = 12345result = revers_integer (nmbr) prnt ("rywrs aaf"، nmbr ، "IS:" ، ntyjha) yeh prwghram pehlay 12345 ki kymt kay sath nmbr namy ayk antyjr ki abtda krta haay۔ phir ، yeh un pt kay tawr par nmbr kay sath rywrs_tyjr () fnkshn ko kal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey alt antyjr ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 12345 ka rywrs yeh haay: 54321 is aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh rywrs_tyjr () fnkshn sahayha tawr par dyiay gaye antyjr ko tbdyl krta haay۔antyjr ka aakhry handsha aur isy alt antyjr main shaml krna۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiythndaf rywrs_tyjr (nmbr): alt_nmbr = 0 sain = 1 agar nmbr> = 0 aur -1 nmbr = ABS (nmbr) jabky nmbr> 0: handsha = nmbr ٪ 10 alt_nmbr = alt_nmbr * 10 + handsay nmbr //= 10 rytrn sain * alt_nmbr yeh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk add nmbr lyta hay aur alt antyjr ko lwtata haay۔yha sab sy pehlay ayk mtghyr ko alt_ nmbr 0 par shrwa krta hay aur ayk mtghyr js ko sain kehty hain 1 par agar nmbr msabt hay aur -1 agar nmbr mnfy hay tou -1۔as kay bad ، yeh ABS () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey nmbr ki mtalk kymt lyta haay۔madaywlw ka astamal karty hoey nmbr kay aakhry handsay ko nkalnay aur antyjr dawyzen ka astamal karty hoey isy alt nmbr main shaml karnay kay liye thwray dyr ka astamal hawta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh asal alamt pehlay shrwa hawta haayayk antyjr js ko 12345 ki kymt kay sath nmbr kaha jata haay۔ phir ، yeh un pt kay tawr par nmbr kay sath rywrs_tyjr () fnkshn ko kal krta hay aur ntyjha ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey alt antyjr ko prnt krta haay۔as maamlay main ، aaؤt pt yeh hawgha: 12345 ka rywrs yeh haay: 54321 is aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta Question: yeh chyk karnay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn keh aya koi dyiay gaye nmbr aarmstrwngh nmbr haay۔
Answer: ayk aarmstrwngh nmbr ayk aysy tadad hay jo handswn ki tadad ki taakt kay liye athaiay janay waly apnay handswn ki rkm kay brabr haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، 153 ayk aarmstrwngh nmbr hay kywnkha 1^3 + 5^3 + 3^3 = 153. yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya koi di hogi tadad azaghr main aarmstrwngh nmbr hay ya nahin ، hum kiy nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: ayk lwp ka astamal aur agar byan: hum nmbr kay hr handsay ko nkalnay ، isy handswn ki tadad ki taakt main brahanay aur rkm main shaml karnay kay liye ayk lwp ka astamal krsktay hayn۔as kay bad ، hum yeh janchnay kay liye asal nmbr kay sath rkm ka mwazanha krsktay hain keh aya yeh aarmstrwngh nmbr hay ya nhayn۔yhaan ayk msaal kay nfaza haay: paiythndaf aai ays_aarm astrangh_nmbr (nmbr): nmbr_stry main handsay kay liye nmbr_astr = ays ty aar (nmbr) nmbr_dayjts = lyn (nmbr_str) rkm = 0an pt kay tawr par nmbr aur lwtta hay agar yeh aarmstrwngh nmbr hay aur dusri sawrt main ghalat haay۔yha pehlay nmbr ko tar main tbdyl krta hay aur lyn () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey handswn ki tadad ka hasab lghata haay۔as kay bad ، yeh nmbr kay hr handsay ko nkalnay ، isy ayk add main tbdyl karnay ، isy handswn ki tadad ki taakt main brahanay aur rkm main shaml karnay kay liye ayk lwp ka astamal krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh asal nmbr kay sath rkm ka mwazanha krta hay keh aya yeh aarmstrwngh nmbr haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythn nmbr = 153result = is_armstrong_number (nmbr) prnt (nmbr ، "aarmstrwngh nmbr haay؟" ، ntyjha haay؟ "، ntyjha haay؟" ، ntyjha haay؟ ") yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay 153 ki kymt kay sath nmbr namy ayk antyjr ki abtda krta haay۔ phir ، yeh is_armstrong_number () fnkshn ko nmbr kay sath fwn krta hay aur un pt kay tawr par is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt krta hay keh aya prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey nmbr aarmstrwngh nmbr haay۔as maamlay main ، pydawar hawghy: 153 ayk aarmstrwngh nmbr haay؟trytys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh IS_Armstrong_number () fnkshn sahayha tarykay sy is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh 153 ayk aarmstrwngh nmbr haay۔ astamal karty hoey fharst ki tfhaym: hum nmbr kay hr handsay ko nkalnay kay liye ayk fharst ki tfhaym ka astamal krsktay hain ، isy handswn ki tadad ki taakt main braha saktay hain ، aur isy shaml krsktay hayn۔ayk rkmas kay bad ، hum yeh janchnay kay liye asal nmbr kay sath rkm ka mwazanha krsktay hain keh aya yeh aarmstrwngh nmbr hay ya nhayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythndaf IS_Armstrong_number (nmbr): num_str = str (nmbr) num_digits = len (num_str) jma = rkm ([ant (handsha) ** num_str main handsay kay liye num_digits) wapsy ka khlaan pt kay tawr par nmbr aur lwtta hay agar yeh aarmstrwngh nmbr hay aur dusri sawrt main ghalat haay۔yha pehlay nmbr ko tar main tbdyl krta hay aur lyn () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey handswn ki tadad ka hasab lghata haay۔as kay bad ، yeh nmbr kay hr handsay ko nkalnay ، isy kesi add main tbdyl karnay ، isy handswn ki tadad ki taakt main brahanay aur isy rkm main shaml karnay kay liye ayk fharst ki tfhaym ka astamal krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh asal nmbr kay sath rkm ka mwazanha krta hay keh aya yeh aarmstrwngh nmbr haay۔ yahan fnkshn ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: paiythn nmbr = 153result = is_armstrong_number (nmbr) prnt (nmbr ، "aarmstrwngh nmbr haay؟" ، ntyjha haay؟ "، ntyjha haay؟" ، ntyjha haay؟ ") yeh prwghram sab sy pehlay 153 ki kymt kay sath nmbr namy ayk antyjr ki abtda krta haay۔ phir ، yeh is_armstrong_number () fnkshn ko nmbr kay sath fwn krta hay aur un pt kay tawr par is kay ntyjay ko mtghyr kay ntyjay main astwr krta haay۔aakhr main ، yeh prnt krta hay keh aya prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey nmbr aarmstrwngh nmbr haay۔as maamlay main ، pydawar hawghy: 153 ayk aarmstrwngh nmbr haay؟trytys aaؤt pt sy ptha chlta hay keh IS_Armstrong_number () fnkshn sahayha tawr par is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh 153 ayk aarmstrwngh nmbr haay۔ dono
