nwda۔node.palent = baiyn_chda dayf dakhl karain (khwd ، wyl): nwda = nwda (wyl) nwda.fynt = koi bhi nwda nhayn۔ wal = wyl nwda.lft = koi bhi nahin nwda nhayn۔. rwt jabky mwjwdha: waldyn = mwjwdha if node.val <mwjwdha۔ wwl: mwjwdha = mwjwdha۔ lyft awr: mwjwdha = mwjwdha۔ rait nwda.fynt = waldyn agar waldyn nahin hain tw: syl.rwt = nwda aylf nwda.wl <waldyn۔wyl: pyrnt. lyft = nwda awr: waldyn۔ rait = nwda agar nwda.fynt koi nahin haay: nwda.aykwlr = 0 wapsy agar nwda.fynt.fynt koi bhi nahin haay۔: jabky nwda.fynt aur nwda۔ pyrynt.aykwlr == 1: agar nwda.parynt == nwda.parynt.parynt. rait: ankl = nwda.parynt.pynt.ylft agar ankl aur ankl۔ klwr == 1: nwda۔parent.color = 0 chank.color = 0 node.parent.parent.color = 1 nwda = nwda. pyrynt.pyirnt awr: agar nwda == nwda.parynt.ylft: nwda = nwda۔ pyrynt sylf۔ rwtyt_ rait (nwda).PARENT.COLOR = 0 node.parent.parent.color = 1 self.rotate_left (node.parent.parent) else: chcha = node.parent.parent.right agar chcha aur chcha == 1: nwda.pynt۔rnghyn = 0 ankl.klwr = 0 nwda.parynt.parynt.alwr = 1 nwda = nwda.parynt.parynt dwsry: agar nwda == nwda.parynt. rait: nwda = nwda.fynt sylf۔.kwlr = 0 nwda.parynt.parynt.alwr = 1 sylf۔ rwtyt_ rait (nwda.parynt.parynt) sylf.rwt.aywt۔ kalwr = 0 dayf srch (sylf ، wyl): mwjwdha = sylf۔ rwt jabky mwjwdha: agar mwjwdha۔== wyl: rytrn trw aylf krnt۔ wwl> wyl: krnt = krnt۔ lyft awr: mwjwdha = krnt۔ rait rytrn falsytys prwghram ayk klas nwda ki wzuahat krta hay jo srkh rngh kay drkht main nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay aur klas `ryda blk try

Question: tyn dyiay gaye tarwn ki tawyl trien mshtrkha hasawl tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn۔
Answer: tyn dyiay gaye dawrwn ki sab sy tawyl aam mshtrkha hasawl tlash karnay kay l we ، hum do tarwn kay liye tawyl arsaay sy aam mshtrkha (LCS) alghwrthm ko tyn tarwn tak braha saktay hayn۔tynwn dawrwn kay ayl sy ays ko tynwn dyiay gaye slslay main mshtrkha mtzuad ki lmbaiy ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye 3D srny tshkyl dy kar mthark prwghramngh ka astamal karty hoey paya jaskta haay۔shaml karain <cstring> nam aspys ays ty day ka astamal karty hoey ؛ INT LCSOF3 (strngh X ، strngh Y ، strngh Z ، INT M ، INT N ، INT O) {INT L [M + 1] [N + 1] [O + 1] ؛(int i = 0 ؛ i <= m ؛ i ++) {for (int j = 0 ؛ j <= n ؛ j ++) {for (int k = 0 ؛ k <= o ؛ k ++) {aghr (i ==0 || j == 0 || k == 0) {l [i] [j] [k] = 0 ؛} wrnha agar (x [i - 1] == y [j - 1] && x [i - 1] == z [k - 1]) {l [i] [j] [k] = l [i -1] [J - 1] [K - 1] + 1 ؛} else {l [i] [j] [k] = zayada sy zayada (zayadha sy zayada (l [i - 1] [j] [k] ، l [i] [j - 1] [k]) ، l [i] [J] [K - 1]) ؛}}}} wapsy l [m] [n] [o] ؛} ant myn () {strngh x = "aggt12" ؛strngh y = "12txayb" ؛strngh zayda = "12xba" ؛int m = x.length () ؛int n = y.length () ؛int o = z.length () ؛cout << "tyn tar kay LCs ki lmbaiy haay" << lcsof3 (x ، y ، z ، m ، n ، o) << endl ؛waps 0 ؛} is aml draamd main ، fnkshn LCSOF3 () tyn tar x ، y ، aur z un pt kay sath sath un ki lmbaiy M ، N ، aur O kay sath lyta haay۔as kay bad yeh tynwn dyiay gaye slslay main mshtrkha mshtrkha ki lmbaiy ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk 3D srny L tshkyl dyta haay۔as kay bad fnkshn mthark prwghramngh ka astamal karty hoey thry day srny ko bhrta hay aur tynwn astrnghs 12.1 jy ay ay ayksfwrjyks 2 anklyda haylp kay ayl sy ays ki lmbaiy ko lwtata haay۔

Question: kesi fnkshn ko yeh chyk karnay kay liye nafza karain keh aya dyiay gaye nmbr char ki taakt haay۔
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay bohat sy tarykay hain keh aya ayk dyiay gaye nmbr char ki taakt hay ya nhayn۔ayk aasan hal yeh hay keh nmbr ko 4 sy bar bar tksym karain aur yeh chyk karain keh aya recursive dawyzen kay bad ki kymt 11 bn jati haay۔ dusra hal yeh hay keh nmbr ko 4 sy tksym karnay kay liye ayk lwp ka astamal karain jab tak keh yeh 4 sy kam nah haw12. tesra hal yeh hay keh bt waiza aaprytrza ko yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jaye keh aya nmbr ki bainry nmaindghy main sirf ayk syt bt hay aur yahan tak keh pwzayshn 3 main koi aur syt bts nahin hayn۔#shaml karain <iostream> nam ki jghha STD ka astamal karty hoey Bool bwl aais pawr aafwr (ant NUM) {aghr (num <= 0) {ghlta waps ؛} jabky (num> = 4) {aghr (nmbr ٪ 4! = 0) {ghlta waps ؛} nmbr /= 4 ؛} waps nmbr == 1 ؛} ant myn () {ant NUM = 64 ؛aghr (aais pawr aafwr (nmbr)) {cout << num << "4 ki taakt haay" << ayndal ؛} dusri {cout << num << "4 ki taakt nahin haay" << ayndal ؛} waps 0 ؛} is nfaza main ، fnkshn aais pawr aafwr () un pt kay tawr par ayk add nmbr lyta hay aur agar nmbr 4 ki taakt hay ، aur dusri sawrt main ghalat haay۔fnkshn pehlay chyk krta hay keh aya nmbr 0 sy kam ya is kay brabr hay ، aur agar aysa hay tou ، ghalat lwtta haay۔as kay bad yeh NUM ko 4 sy tksym karnay kay liye thwray dyr ka astamal krta hay jab tak keh yeh 4 sy kam nah haw۔ agar NUM kesi bhi mwka par 4 sy tksym nahin hawta hay tou ، fnkshn ghalat lwtta haay۔aakhr main ، fnkshn chyk krta hay keh agar NUM 1 kay brabr hay ، aur agar aysa hay tou ، sch 2.1 tywtwrals pwaint 2 haylw aay sy aym 3 awpnyns waps krta hay

Question: "har skay kay frk ki mhadwd frahamy kay sath ، tbdyly ki ayk mkrrha rkm bnanay kay liye kam sy kam tadad main skkwn ki tlash kay l a ayk prwghram lkhyn۔"
Answer: hr skay kay frk ki mhadwd frahamy kay sath ayk mkhsawsa mkdar main tbdyly kay l needed kam sy kam skay ki tlash kay l we ، hum mthark prwghramngh astamal krsktay hayn۔ayk nktaha nzar yeh hay keh hr kymt main 0 sy di hogi tbdyly ki mkdar main tbdyly kay l needed zurwry skkwn ki kam sy kam tadad ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk saf tyar karna haay۔as kay bad hum hr skay kay frk kay zaryaay tkrar krsktay hain aur is skay kay frk ko astamal krkay hr kymt kay liye saf ko ap dayt krsktay hayn۔srny main hatmy kymt di hogi rkm 12 kay liye tbdyly kay l needed drkar skkwn ki kam sy kam tadad hawghy۔ C ++ main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza haay: C ++#shaml <iostream>#aab wa hawa> nam aspys ays ty day ka astamal karty hoey ؛ INT MINCOINS (INT MINT MINCOINS (INTskay [] ، ant aym ، ant wy) {ant day py [wy + 1] ؛day py [0] = 0 ؛kay liye (int i = 1 ؛ i <= v ؛ i ++) {dp [i] = int_max ؛} for (int i = 0 ؛ i <m ؛ i ++) {for (int j = coins [i] ؛ j <= v ؛ j ++) {aghr (dp [j - cins [i]]! = int_max) {dp[j] = mnt (day py [jay] ، day py [jay - skay [i]] + 1) ؛}}} wapsy DP [v] == ant_myks؟-1: dp [v] ؛} ant myn () {ant skay [] = {1 ، 5 ، 10 ، 25} ؛ant aym = saiza (skay) / saiza (skay [0]) ؛int v = 30 ؛ant mnwwnt = mnkwainza (skay ، aym ، wy) ؛aghr (MINCOUNT == -1) {cout << "" << v << endl kay liye tbdyly karna mmkn nahin haay۔} else {cout << "km sy km" << mnwwnt << "skay" << v << endl kay liye tbdyly kay liye drkar skay ؛} waps 0 ؛} is nfaza main ، fnkshn mnkwainza () skay kay frkwn kay skay ، skay kay frkwn ki tadad ، aur un pt kay btawr tbdyly V ki mkdar lyta haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay 0 sy V main hr kymt main tbdyly lanay kay liye drkar skay ki kam sy kam tadad ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk srny day py bnata haay۔ yeh saf main pehli kymt 0 aur dyghr tamam akdar ko anfynty main shrwa krta haay۔as kay bad fnkshn hr skay kay frk kay zaryaay tkrar krta hay aur hr kymt kay liye saf ko ap dayt krta hay jo is skay kay frk ko astamal krkay bnaya jaskta haay۔aakhr main ، fnkshn tbdyly ki mkrrha rkm kay liye saf main kymt lwtata hay ، ya -1 agar is rkm main tbdyly karna mmkn nahin hay tou is rkm main tbdyly karna mmkn nahin haay۔

Question: ayk lahakha srny ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas bnaiyn aur zayly jghhawn ki tlash kay l methods tarykwn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ayk lahakha srny ki nmaindghy karnay aur sbstranghza ki tlash kay l methods tarykwn ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk azaghr ki klas bnanay kay l we ، hum kesi dyiay gaye tar kay tamam lahakha ki ayk saf tyar karnay aur phir lchkdar tawr par chhantnay kay liye lahakha srny ko haasal karnay kay nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn۔as kay bad hum lahakha srny 12 main zayly zakhyrwn ki tlash kay liye bainry srch ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ yahan ayk lahakha srny kay liye ayk azaghr klas ka nfaza haay: paiythnklas lahakha: Def __init __ (khwd ، s): self.s = s self.n = len (s) self.suffixes = [s [i:] kay liye I in range (self.n)] sell، pytrn): aym = lyn (pytrn) baien ، dien = 0 ، sylf۔ ayn - 1 jabky baien <= daiyn: drmyany = (baiyn + daiyn) // 2 lahakha = sylf۔ swfks [syl.fks_ryry [wsta]]aghr pytrn> lahakha: baien = wsta + 1 alyf pytrn <lahakha: dien = wsta - 1 awr: khud waps kryn۔ suffix_array [MID] wapsy -1 -1 is par aml draamd main ، lahakha klas un pt kay tawr par ayk tar lyta hay aur lahakha lahakha srny ko shrwa krta haaylahakha kay trtyb shuda asharywn ko thamnay kay liye ays aur lahakha_ ary srny kay tamam lahakha thamyn۔tlash ka tarykha un pt kay tawr par ayk pytrn ki tar lyta hay aur lahakha srny main pytrn kay pehlay wakaay ka andayks tlash karnay kay liye lahakha_ry srny par bainry tlash krta haay۔aghr pytrn nahin mil jata hay tou ، tarykha kar -11. yahan lahakha lahakha klas ka ayk msaal astamal haay: azaghr = "kylay" sa = lahakha (s) prnt (sa.suffix_array) # prnts [5 ، 3 ، 1 ، 0 ،4 ، 2] prnt (sa.search ("ana")) # prnt 1 prnt (sa.search ("xyz")) # prnts -1 is msaal kay tawr par ، hum "kylay" kay tar kay liye ayk lahakha lahakha aabjykt bnatay hain aur trtyb dyiay gaye prnt karty haynlahakha_ry۔as kay bad hum lahakha srny main "ana" kay nmwnay ki tlash karty hain aur pehlay wakaha kay asharyha ko prnt karty hain ، jo 1 haay۔ aakhr kar ، hum is nmwnha "XYZ" ki tlash karty hain jo lahakha srny main mwjwd nahin haay۔

Question: "ksy fnkshn ko is bat ki janch pratal kay liye nafza karain keh aya kesi dyiay gaye tar mtwazan kwsyn ، brykt ، ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta ، kymtyn ، zaawyha brykt ، aur slysh kay sath ayk drst azahaar hay ، js sy ghhrylw tasarat ki ajazat di jaskty haay۔"
Answer: kesi fnkshn ko amly jamha phananay kay l a kesi fnkshn ko mtwazan kwsyn ، brykt ، ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta ، kymtyn ، zaawyha brykt ، aur slysh kay sath ayk drst azahaar hay ، js sy nystda azahaarat ki ajazat di jaskty hay ، hum afttahay alamtwn aur pap ko tryk rkhnay kay liye ayk astyk ka astamal krsktay hayn۔jb hamain kesi akhttamy alamt ka samna karna prata hay tou woh astyk sy door rhatay hayn۔aghr akhttamy alamt astyk kay awpry hasaay sy mmasal hay tou ، hum jary rkhyn۔bsawrt dyghr ، azahaar mtwazan nahin haay۔ham kwda ko mazeed jama 12 bnanay kay liye afttahay aur akhttamy alamtwn ka nkshha bnanay kay liye ayk lght ka astamal bhi krsktay hayn۔ yahan azaghr main fnkshn ka nfaza haay: paiythwndaf aai ays_walyda_ aykspryshn (ays): astyk = [] mypngh = {')': '(' ، '،']:' ['،'} ':' {'،'> ':' <'،'/':'/'} quots = [' '' '،' '،' '،' `']ays: agar mypngh main sy۔as par aml draamd ko astyk karain ، fnkshn IS_Valid_expression () un pt kay tawr par ayk tar lyta hay aur agar strngh mtwazan kwsyn ، brykt ، ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta ، kymtyn ، zaawyha brykt ، aur slysh kay sath ayk drst azahaar hay ، js sy ghhrylw tasarat ، aur jhwtay wysay hi ajazat di jati haay۔. fnkshn pehlay ayk khaly astyk aur ayk lght ki nkshha sazay ka aaghaza krta hay takha akhttamy alamtwn ko un kay isi afttahay alamtwn ka nkshha bnaya jaskay۔ is kay bad tar main hr krdar kay zaryaay tkrar hawta hay aur astyk par afttahay alamtwn aur hawalha jat ko dhkyl dyta haay۔aghr is ka akhttamy alamt ka samna karna prata hay tou ، yeh astyk kay awpry hasaay ko pap krta hay aur chyk krta hay keh agar yeh isi afttahay alamt sy mmasal haay۔aghr nahin tou ، fnkshn ghalat lwtta haay۔aakhr main ، agar astyk khaly hay tou ، fnkshn drst lwtta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh tamam alamtyn mmasal hochuki hain ، aur dusri sawrt main ghalat haay۔aghr is_valid_expression (s): prnt (f '{s} ayk drst azahaar haay') awr: prnt (f '{s} ayk drst azahaar nahin haay') is msaal main ، hum chyk karty hain keh strngh ays kay sath ayk drst azahaar hay ya nhayn۔mtwazan kwsyn ، brykt ، ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta whadany ، kymtyn ، zaawyha brykt aur slysh ، js sy ghhrylw tasarat ki ajazat mil jati Question: kesi fnkshn ko yeh chyk karnay kay liye nafza karain keh aya kesi bhi blt un fnkshn ka astamal kyay baghair dyiay gaye nmbr ayk bhatryn mrba hay ya nhayn۔
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya kesi bhi blt un fnkshn ka astamal kyay baghair dyiay gaye nmbr ayk bhatryn mrba hay ، hum mkhtlf tarykwn ko astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch nktaha nzar aur un kay nfaza hayn: nktaha nzar 1: antyjr askwair rwt alghwrthmwn hal antyjr askwair rwt alghwrthm ko astamal karna hay aur is bat ki tsadyk karna hay keh jra ki mrba kymt asal tadad haay۔ham mrba jra kay abtdaiy andazaay kay sath shrwa krsktay hain aur tkrary tawr par andazaha ko bhatr bna saktay hain jab tak keh yeh asal mrba jra main nah aajaiay۔as kay bad hum yeh chyk krsktay hain keh aya andazaha ka mrba asal nmbr 1 kay brabr haay۔ yahan azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza haay: paiythndaf aai ays_pyrfykt_skyir (ayn): agar ayn <0: ghalat waps lwtyn agar n == 0: waps sch andazaha = n waps kryn۔// 2 jabky andazaha karain * andazaha> n: andazaha = (andazaha + n // andazaha) // 2 wapsy ka andazaha * andazaha == is par aml draamd ، fnkshn IS_PERFECT_SQUARE () un pt kay tawr par ayk add N lyta hay aur agar N hay tou sch waps aajata haay۔ayk kaml mrba aur ghlta۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay chyk krta hay agar n 0 sy kam hay aur agar yeh hay tou ghalat lwtata haay۔as kay bad yeh janch pratal krta hay keh aya n 0 kay brabr hay aur agar yeh hay tou schaiy waps aajata haay۔as kay bad N kay mrba jra ka abtdaiy andazaha N // 2 kay tawr par shrwa krta haay۔ phir yeh andazaha aur N // andazaha ki awsta ki awsta kmpywtngh krkay aur // aaprytr ka astamal karty hoey kryb trien addy tak phanch kar andazaha lghata haay۔as kay bad yeh janch pratal krta hay keh aya andazaha ka mrba N kay brabr hay aur agar yeh hay tou woh sch haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh ghalat lwtta haay۔aghr kesi wkt kymt 0 hawjaty hay tou ، hum khaha saktay hain keh nmbr ayk bhatryn mrba haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh nahin haay۔ yahan azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza haay: paiythwndaf is_perfect_square (n): agar n <0: ghalat i = 1 waps lwtaiyn jabky n> 0: n -= i += 2 wapsy n == 0 is par aml draamd، fnkshn is_perfect_square () un pt kay tawr par ayk add n lyta hay aur agar n ayk kaml mrba hay aur ghalat hay tou woh sch haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay chyk krta hay agar n 0 sy kam hay aur agar yeh hay tou ghalat lwtata haay۔as kay bad yeh mtghyr I ko 1 sy shrwa krta hay aur bar bar n sy ajyb tadad ko ghhta dyta hay jab tak keh yeh 0 ya mnfy nah hawjaiay۔aghr kesi wkt N 0 bn jata hay tou ، fnkshn drst hawjata haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh jhwty lwtta haay۔ IS_PERFECT_SQUARE () fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal: azaghr prnt (is_perfect_square (16)) # prnts trw prnt (IS_PERFECT_SQUARE (17)) # prnts prnts is msaal kay tawr par ، hum chyk karty hain keh nmbr 16 aur 17 kaml askwair hain ya nhayn۔is_perfect_square () fnkshn ka astamal karty hawiay۔fnkshn pehli kal kay liye sch aur dusri kal kay liye ghalat hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh 16 ayk kaml mrba hay lekin 17 nahin haay۔

Question: do dyiay gaye dawrwn ki sab sy tawyl aam sstrngh tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: do dyiay gaye dawrwn ki sab sy tawyl mshtrkha tzaiyn ki tlash kay l we ، hum mthark prwghramngh astamal krsktay hayn۔as kay bad hum tybl main zayada sy zayada kymt tlash krsktay hain aur isy sab sy tawyl aam sbstrngh nkalnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔ yahan azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza haay: paiythndaf tawyl tryn_kwmwn_sbstrngh (ays 1 ، ays 2): aym ، ayn = lyn (ays 1) ، lyn (ays 2)jdwl = [[0] * (n + 1) rynj main _ kay liye (m + 1)] myks_ln = 0 akhttam = 0 kay liye rynj (1 ، aym + 1): rynj main jay kay liye (1 ، n + 1): agar S1 [i - 1] == s2 [j - 1]: tybl [i] [j] = tybl [i - 1] [j - 1] + 1 agar tybl [i] [j]> myks_ln:myks_ln = tybl [i] [j] akhttam = i else: tybl [i] [j] = 0 waps S1 [akhttam - myks_ln: akhttam] is aml main ، fnkshn sab sy tawyl_kwmn_sbstrngh () do taryn S1 aur S2 ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay awrdwnwn dawrwn ki sab sy tawyl aam sbstrngh lwtta haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay tawl wa arzu (M + 1) X (n + 1) kay sath tybl tybl ki abtda krta hay ، jahan M aur N baltrtyb S1 aur S2 ki lmbaiy hayn۔yha mtghyrat myks_ln ko bhi shrwa krta hay aur 0 par akhttam pzayr hawta hay takha S1 main zayada sy zayada lmbaiy aur is ki aakhry pwzayshn ko tryk rkhnay kay l .۔as kay bad yeh S1 aur S2 kay tamam mmknha zayly zakhyrwn par tkrar krta hay aur hr ayk kay sab sy lmbay lmbay aam lahakha ki lmbaiy kay sath tybl ko bhrta haay۔aghr kesi aam lahakha ki lmbaiy myks_ln sy zayada hay tou ، fnkshn myks_ln ko ap dayt krta hay aur niy zayada sy zayada lmbaiy aur akhttamy pwzayshn ki akasy karnay kay liye akhttam pzayr hawta haay۔aakhr main ، fnkshn S1 aur S2 kay sab sy tawyl aam sbstrngh ko waps krta hay js main S1 kay strngh ko nkala jata hay jo pwzayshn kay akhttam par khtm hawta hay aur is ki lmbaiy zayada haay۔prnt (tawyl tryn_kwmwn_sbstrngh (S1 ، S2)) # prnts "ABC" is msaal main ، hamain tawyl tryn_kwmwn_sbstrngh () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey tarwn ki "ABABC" aur "BABCA" ki sab sy tawyl aam sbstrngh mlty haay۔fnkshn "ABC" lwtata hay ، jo do tarwn ki sab sy tawyl aam sbstrngh haay۔

Question: add ki di hogi fharst main do nmbrwn ki zayada sy zayada XOR kymt tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn۔
Answer: antyjrza ki ayk di hogi fharst main do nmbrwn ki zayada sy zayada XOR kymt tlash karnay kay l we ، hum fharst main mwjwd hr mmknha jwraay kay XOR ki ghnty karnay aur zayada sy zayada kymt par nzar rkhnay kay liye bt wys XOR aaprytr (^) ka astamal krsktay hayn۔taham ، is nktaha nzar main O (n^2) ki wkt ki pychydghy hay ، jahan N fharst ki lmbaiy hay ، jo bray fharstwn kay liye mwsar nahin haay۔ ayk zayada mwsar nktaha nzar yeh hay keh bainry nmaindghy ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye traiy dayta dahanchay ka astamal kya jaiay۔fharst main shaml nmbrwn ko aur do nmbrwn ki zayada sy zayada XOR kymt ko traiy ko abwr krkay aur bts ka antkhab krkay jo XOR ki kymt ko zayada sy zayada bnatay hayn۔as nktaha nzar main O (n lagh aym) ki wkt ki pychydghy hay ، jahan aym fharst main tadad ki sanaiy nmaindghy main bts ki zayada sy zayada tadad hay ، jo brwt fwrs kay nktaha nzar sy kahain bhatr haay۔ is nktaha nzar ka nfaza haay۔azaghr myn: paiythwnklas traiynwda: dayf __init __ (khwd): sylf۔ chaildaryn = {} sylf۔ aais_ynda = falsklas try: dayf __Init __ (khwd): syl.rwt = traiynwda () dayf dakhl (khwd ، nmbr): nwda = khwd۔rynj (31 ، -1 ، -1) main I kay liye jra: bt = (num >> i) aur 1 agar thwraa sa nwda main nahin haay۔ bchwn myn: nwda.krynyn [bt] = traiynwda () nwda = nwda۔ chaildar [bt] node.is_end = hakyky Def find_max_xor (khwd ، nmbr): nwda = sylf.rwt xor = 0 main I kay liye rynj (31 ، -1 ، -1): bt = (nmbr >> i) aur 1 agar 1 -btnwda myn۔ bchwn myn: nwda = nwda.krza [1 - bt] zawr | = (1 << i) awr: nwda = nwda.krnyn [bt] waps xordef myks_ aykswr (nmbr): try = try () nmbr main nmbr kay liye nmbr: trie.insert (num) max_xor = 0 nums main nmbr kay liay: myks_ aykswr = myks (myks_ aykswr ، try۔fainda_myks_ aykswr (nmbr)) myks_ aykswryn ki wapsy is par aml draamd ، trynwda klas try main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay aur is main zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk lght kay bchay hayn۔chailda nwdas aur ayk bwlyn aai ays ay day is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye keh aya nwda kesi nmbr kay akhttam ki nmaindghy krta haay۔try klas khud hi try ki nmaindghy krty hay aur is ki jra nwda haay۔try klas traiy main ayk nmbr dakhl karnay aur traiy main kesi nmbr ki zayada sy zayada XOR kymt tlash karnay kay tarykay mhaya krty haay۔ myks_ aykswr () fnkshn un pt kay tawr par antyjr nmbrwn ki fharst lyta hay aur fharst main do nmbrwn ki zayada sy zayada XOR kymt lwtata haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay ayk try tshkyl dyta hay aur fharst main mwjwd tamam nmbrwn ko traiy main dakhl krta haay۔as kay bad is fharst main mwjwd tamam nmbrwn par tkrar krta hay aur Find_max_xor () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey try main hr nmbr ki zayada sy zayada XOR kymt tlash krty haay۔aakhr main ، fnkshn zayada sy zayada XOR wylyw lwtata haay۔ yahan myks_ aykswr () fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal haay: paiythwnwms = [3 ، 10 ، 5 ، 25 ، 2 ، 8] prnt (myks_ aykswr (nmbr)) # prnt 28 un msaal kay tawr par ، hamMAX_XOR () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey lst 31052528 main do nmbrwn ki zayada sy zayada XOR kymt tlash kryn۔fnkshn 28 lwtta hay ، jo fharst main do nmbrwn ki zayada sy zayada XOR kymt haay۔

Question: "ksy fnkshn ko is bat ki janch pratal kay liye nafza karain keh aya dyiay gaye tar mtwazan kwsyn ، brykt aur ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta whadany kay sath ayk drst azahaar hay ، js sy ghhrylw tasarat aur aaprytrza ko pysh nzaarha kya jaskta haay۔"
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya ayk dyiay gaye tar mtwazan kwsyn ، brykt ، aur ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta whadany kay sath ayk drst azahaar hay ، js sy ghhrylw azahaar aur aaprytrza ko pyshghy pysh karnay ki ajazat di jaskty hay ، hum afttahay alamtwn ko tryk rkhnay aur astyk sy door rkhnay kay liye astyk dayta dahanchha astamal krsktay hayn۔hamyn ayk akhttamy alamt ka samna karna prata haay۔aghr akhttamy alamt astyk kay awpry hasaay sy mmasal hay tou ، hum jary rkhyn۔bsawrt dyghr ، azahaar mtwazan nahin haay۔jb hum isi tarah kay akhttamy alamtwn ka samna karty hain tou hum afttahay alamtwn ko astyk par dhkyl kar aur un ko pap karty hoey bhi ghhrylw tasarat ko snbhal saktay hayn۔ yahan tak keh azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza: paithwndaf aai ays_walyda_ aykspryshn (ays): astyk = [] ays main sy kay liay:aghr c in "({[": stack.append (c) elif c in ")}]": agar astyk nahin hay tw: jhwta alyf waps lwtaiyn c == ")" aur astyk [-1] == "(": astyk.POP () ELIF C == "}" aur astyk [-1] == "{": stack.pop () elif c == "]" aur astyk [-1] == "[": stack.pop() awr: ghalat rytrn is aml ko astyk nah karain ، fnkshn IS_Valid_expression () un pt kay tawr par ayk tar lyta hay aur agar mtwazan kwsyn ، brykt ، aur ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta whadany kay sath ayk drst azahaar haay۔ayk khaly astyk۔ phir yeh ays kay tamam krdarwn par tkrar krta hay aur abtdaiy alamtwn ko astyk par dhkyl dyta hay aur jab hum isi tarah kay akhttamy alamtwn ka samna karty hain tou inhain pap krdytay hayn۔aghr akhttamy alamt astyk kay awpry hasaay sy mmasal hay tou ، hum jary rkhyn۔bsawrt dyghr ، azahaar mtwazan nahin hay aur fnkshn ghalat lwtta haay۔aghr hum tar kay akhttam par phanch jatay hain aur astyk khaly hawta hay tou ، azahaar mtwazan hawta hay aur fnkshn sch hawta haay۔ yahan IS_Valid_expression () fnkshn: azaghr = "((2 + 3) * 5) / (4) ki ayk msaal astamal haay۔- 1) "prnt (is_valid_expression (s)) # prnts sch hay ، is msaal kay tawr par ، hum chyk karty hain keh aya tar" (2 + 3) * 5) / (4 - 1) "mtwazan kwsyn ، brykt ، aur kay sath ayk drst azahaar haayis_valid_expression () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta whadany۔fnkshn drst lwtta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh azahaar drst aur mtwazan haay۔

Question: mwsar sabkha tlash aur alfaza ki ghnty ki hamayt kay sath ayk try (sabkha drkht) ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas lkhyn۔
"ayk mkrrha tadad kay sath syrahyan chrahnay kay liye alag alag tarykwn ki tadad tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn ، jahan aap ayk wkt main 1 ya 2 kdm athasktay hayn۔"
Answer: syrahy par chrahnay kay alag alag tarykwn ki tadad tlash karnay kay l a ، ayk dyiay gaye akdamat kay sath ، jahan aap ayk wkt main 1 ya 2 kdm la saktay hain ، hum mthark prwghramngh astamal krsktay hayn۔ham 1 kdm aur 2 kdmwn kay bnyady maamlat sy shrwa krsktay hain ، jn main baltrtyb 1 rastha aur 2 tarykay chrahnay kay liye hayn۔as kay bad hum is tkrar kay rshtay ko astamal krsktay hain keh n akdamat par chrahnay kay tarykwn ki tadad N-1 akdamat aur N-2 akdamat par chrahnay kay tarykwn ki tadad kay brabr haay۔as ki wjha yeh hay keh hum ya tou (N-1) wain kdm sy 1 kdm athasktay hain ya NTH mrhalay tak phanchnay kay liye (N-2) wain kdm sy 2 kdm atha saktay hayn۔ham hr kdm par chrahnay aur akdar ki tkrary kay tarykwn ki tadad ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk fharst ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ yahan azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza haay: paiythndaf kaؤnt_ wyza (ayn): agar n == 1: waps 1 agar n == 2:2 tarykay waps karain = [0] * (n + 1) tarykwn [1] = 1 tarykay [2] = 2 main I kay liye (3 ، n + 1): tarykay [i] = tarykay [i - 1] + tarykay[i - 2] is aml main lwtnay waly tarykay [n] ، fnkshn kaؤnt_ wyza () ayk un pt kay tawr par ayk add N lyta hay aur n kdmwn kay sath syrahyan chrahnay kay alag alag tarykwn ki tadad ko waps krta hay ، jahan aap ya tou 1 ya 2 kdm athasktay hayn۔ayk wkt.fnkshn sab sy pehlay chyk krta hay keh agar n 1 ya 2 kay brabr hay aur is sy mtalkha bys kys ki akdar ko lwtata haay۔as kay bad yeh lmbaiy kay ayk fharst kay tarykwn ka aaghaza krta hay js main tamam akdar 0 par syt ki jati hayn۔as kay bad tkrar kay sath rshtha ka astamal karty hoey 3 sy N tak kay tarykwn ki akdar [i] ki akdar ki ghnty krty haay۔aakhr main ، yeh un tarykwn ki kdr ko waps krta hay [n] ، jo n mrahal kay sath syrahyan chrahnay kay alag alag tarykwn ki tadad haay۔ yahan ghnty_ays () fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal: paiythn = 5 prnt (ghnty_ays (ayn)) # prnts 8inas msaal kay tawr par ، hamain ghnty_ays () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey 5 akdamat kay sath syrahyan chrahnay kay alag alag tarykwn ki tadad mlty haay۔fnkshn 8 lwtta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh syrahyan par chrahnay kay 8 alag alag tarykay hayn۔

Question: kesi fnkshn ko yeh chyk karnay kay liye nafza karain keh aya dyiay gaye nmbr lagh un kay wkt ki pychydghy ka astamal karty hoey kesi aur nmbr ki taakt haay۔
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya dyiay gaye nmbr kesi dusray nmbr ki taakt hay jo lwghrthmk taim pychydghy ka astamal karty hoey ، hum lwghrthmk praprty ka astamal krsktay hain keh agar koi nmbr Y X ki taakt hay tou ، phir bys X main Y ka lwghrthm ayk add haay۔ham is praprty ka astamal mmknha bys nmbr ki bnyad par dyiay gaye nmbr kay lwghrthm ko tlash karnay kay liye krsktay hain aur chyk karain keh aya yeh koi add haay۔ham dyiay gaye nmbr kay 2 sy mrba rwt tak tamam mmknha bys nmbrwn par tkrar krsktay hain aur yeh chyk karain keh aya lwghrthm ayk add haay۔ yeh azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza haay: paiythwnympwrt myth dayf aai ays_ pawr_f (nmbr): agar nmbr ==1: rynj (2 ، int (math.sqrt (num)) + 1) main I kay liye sch waps lwtyn: agar math.log (num ، i) .is_integer (): sch waps lwtaiyn is par aml draamd ، fnkshn is_power_of ()an pt kay tawr par do antyjr nmbr aur bys lyta hay aur agar nmbr bys ki taakt hay ، aur dusri sawrt main ghalat hay tou woh sch haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay chyk krta hay keh agar nmbr 1 kay brabr hay aur sch waps aajata hay ، kywnkha 1 kesi bhi adaay ki taakt haay۔as kay bad yeh tamam mmknha bys nmbrwn par 2 sy nmbr kay mrba jra tak phanch jata hay aur chyk krta hay keh agar mmknha bys nmbr ki bnyad par NUM ka lwghrthm flwt klas kay IS_Integer () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk add haay۔aghr yeh ayk add hay tou ، fnkshn drst lwtta haay۔aghr mmknha bys nmbrwn main sy kesi kay ntyjay main koi antyjr lwghrthm nahin hawta hay tou ، fnkshn ghalat ko waps krta haay۔ IS_POWER_OF () fnkshn ki msaal kay tawr par astamal: Pythonnum = 64base = 2 prnt (IS_POWER_OF (Num ، base)) # prnt is msaal kay tawr par ، hum chyk karty hain ، hum chyk karty hayn۔aghr nmbr 64 IS_POWER_OF () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey 2 ki taakt haay۔fnkshn sch ki taraf lwtta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh 64 2.1CODINGNINJAS2GEEKSFORGEEKS3TOWARDASDASDASCINCEINCE 4MATHOVERFLOW5RITAMBHARA ki taakt hay

Question: awnchaiywn ki ayk di hogi fharst main hastghrams kay zaryaha tshkyl shuda msttayl ka zayada sy zayada rkbha tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: awnchaiywn ki di hogi fharst main hastghrams kay zaryaha tshkyl shuda msttayl ka zayada sy zayada rkbha tlash karnay kay l we ، hum hastwghram main sab sy braa msttayl tlash karnay kay nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn۔ham fharst main hr awnchaiy ko hastwghram main bar kay tawr par alaj krsktay hain ، aur sab sy braa msttayl tlash krsktay hain jo slakhwn ka astamal karty hoey tshkyl diya jaskta haay۔sb sy braay msttayl ki awnchaiy mkhtsar trien bar ki awnchaiy kay brabr hogi aur chwraaiy baien aur dien taraf ki slakhwn kay darmiyan fasalay kay brabr hogi jo mkhtsar bar sy kam hayn۔ham hastghram main slakhwn kay asharywn ko tryk rkhnay aur hr bar kay liye sab sy braay msttayl kay alakay ki ghnty kay liye ayk astyk ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ yahan azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza haay: paiythndaf myks_ryktnghl_aryha (awnchaiy): astyk = [] myks_yrya =0 i = 0 jab main <lyn (awnchaiy): agar astyk ya awnchaiy nahin tou [i]> = awnchaiy [astyk [-1]]: astyk.aypynda (i) i += 1 awr: tap = astyk.pp ()rkbha = awnchaiy [awpr] * (i - Question: ayk ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas bnaiyn aur dayjkstra kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey do amwdywn kay mabyn mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay tarykwn ko nafza kryn۔

Question: "ksy fnkshn ko is bat ki janch pratal kay liye nafza karain keh aya kesi dyiay gaye tar mtwazan kwsyn ، brykt ، ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta ، kymtyn ، zaawyha brykt ، aur slysh kay sath ayk drst azahaar hay ، js sy ghhrylw tasarat aur aaprytrza ki pysh ksh ki jaskty haay۔"

Question: mwsar azuafay aur mmbrshp chyk kay liye taawn kay sath blwm fltr ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas lkhyn۔
Answer: mwsar azuafay aur mmbrshp chyk ki hamayt kay sath blwm fltr ki nmaindghy karnay waly ayk azaghr klas bnanay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl akdamat astamal krsktay hayn: blwm fltr ko lmbaiy M aur K haysh fnkshn ki thwray sy saf kay sath shrwa kryn۔blwm fltr main ansar۔as tarykha kar ko ansar kay liye kay haysh akdar ki ghnty karni chahaiay aur is sy mtalk bts ko bt srny main 1. par mushtamil haay۔as tarykha kar ko ansar kay liye kay haysh akdar ki ghnty karni chahaiay aur yeh chyk karna chahaiay keh aya bt srny main mtalkha bts sab par syt hayn۔fltraghr bts main sy kesi ko 1 par syt nahin kya gaya hay tou ، tarykha ghalat lwtta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh ansar ykyny tawr par blwm fltr main nahin haay۔ azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza haay: paiythwnympwrt aym aym aych 3 klas blwm fltr: dayf __init __ (khwd ، aym ، kay): self.m = m sylf۔.m self.bit_array [haysh_walyw] = schay dayf par mushtamil hawta hay (khwd ، ansar): main rynj main (khwd) kay liay: haysh_wylyw = aym aym aych 3. hash (ansar ، i) ٪ sylf۔ agar khud nahin haay۔: ghalat rytrn ko waps karain is par aml draamd ، blwm fltr klas blwm fltr ki nmaindghy krta hay aur is main tyn tarykay hayn: __init __ () ، shaml karain () ، aur () par mushtamil haay۔__init __ () ka tarykha blwm fltr ko lmbaiy M aur K haysh afaal ki thwray sy saf kay sath shrwa krta haay۔ADD () tarykha ayk ansar ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur Mummurhash3 haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ansar kay liye K haysh akdar ki ghnty krta haay۔as kay bad is sy mtalk bts ko bt srny main sch par syt kya jata haay۔prhayn () tarykha ayk ansar ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur mummurhash3 haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ansar kay liye K haysh akdar ki ghnty krta haay۔as kay bad yeh janch pratal krta hay keh aya bt srny main tarykha ghalat waps aajata hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh ansar ykyny tawr par blwm fltr main nahin haay۔ blwm fltr klas ka ayk msaal astamal haay: paiythnbf = blwm fltr (100 ، 3) by ayf۔ aay Question: mthark prwghramngh ka astamal karty hoey dyiay gaye astrngh main alag alag hasawn ki tadad tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn۔
Answer: mthark prwghramngh ka astamal karty hoey dyiay gaye astrngh main alag alag hasawn ki tadad tlash karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn: lmbaiy N+1 ki fharst DP ko shrwa karain js main tamam akdar 0 par syt ki jien ، jahan N tar ki lmbaiy haay۔1 ، chwnkha ayk khaly tar ka sirf ayk hi hasaha haay۔ tar kay upar aur hr krdar kay liye ، tar main pchhlay harwf kay upar tkrar kryn۔aghr mwjwdha krdar pchhlay krdar kay brabr hay tou ، mwjwdha krdar kay sath khtm hony waly alag alag hasawn ki tadad un alag alag ajtmaay tadad kay brabr hay jo pchhlay krdar kay sath khtm hawty haay۔aghr mwjwdha krdar pchhlay krdar kay brabr nahin hay tou ، mwjwdha krdar kay sath khtm hony waly alag alag hasawn ki tadad un alag alag hasawn ki tadad kay brabr hay jo pchhlay krdar kay sath khtm hawty hay aur is kay sath khtm hony waly alag alag hasawn ki tadad kay sath khtm hawty haay۔pchhlay krdar lekin mwjwdha krdar ko shaml nahin karty hayn۔ham day py srny ka astamal un alag alag hasawn ki tadad par nzar rkhnay kay liye krsktay hain jo hr krdar kay sath khtm hawjatay hayn۔ day py [ayn] ki kdr ko dwbarha bnaiyn ، jo tar main alag alag hasawn ki tadad haay۔ azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza:paiythndaf COUNT_DISTINCT_SUBCENSENS (s): n = len (s) dp = [0] * (n + 1) dp [0] = 1 aakhry_syn = {} i in range (1 ، n + 1): dp [i] =2 * dp [i - 1] agar s [i - 1] aakhry_syn myn: dp [i] - = dp [last_seen [s [i - 1]] - 1] aakhry_syn [s [i - 1]] = main wapsday py [ayn] - 1 is par aml draamd main ، fnkshn kaؤnty_dastnt_sbsns () un pt kay tawr par ayk tar lyta hay aur tar main alag alag hasawn ki tadad ko waps krta haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay lmbaiy N+1 ki fharst DP ko shrwa krta hay js main tamam akdar 0 par syt ki jati hain ، jahan N tar ki lmbaiy haay۔yha day py ko 1 par syt krta hay ، kywnkha khaly tar ka sirf ayk hi hasaha haay۔as kay bad yeh tar par tkrar krta hay aur hr krdar kay l it ، yeh tar main pchhlay harwf par tkrar krta haay۔aghr mwjwdha krdar pchhlay krdar kay brabr hay tou ، mwjwdha krdar kay sath khtm hony waly alag alag hasawn ki tadad un alag alag ajtmaay tadad kay brabr hay jo pchhlay krdar kay sath khtm hawty haay۔aghr mwjwdha krdar pchhlay krdar kay brabr nahin hay tou ، mwjwdha krdar kay sath khtm hony waly alag alag hasawn ki tadad un alag alag hasawn ki tadad kay brabr hay jo pchhlay krdar kay sath khtm hawty hay aur is kay sath khtm hony waly alag alag hasawn ki tadad kay sath khtm hawty haay۔pchhlay krdar lekin mwjwdha krdar ko shaml nahin karty hayn۔fnkshn day py srny ka astamal hr krdar kay sath khtm hony waly alag alag hasawn ki tadad par nzar rkhnay kay liye krta haay۔aakhr main ، fnkshn day py [ayn] mains 1 ki kdr lwtata hay ، jo strngh main alag alag hasawn ki tadad haay۔ ghnty_dastnt_swbsns () fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal: azaghr = 'abab' prnt (ghnty_dastnt_swbsns (zabanyn)) #as msaal kay tawr par 7 un prnts ، hamain COUNT_DISTINCT_SUBSECSENES () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey astrngh 'abab' main alag alag hasawn ki tadad mlty haay۔fnkshn 7 lwtta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh strngh main 7 alag alag mtzuad hayn۔

Question: kesi fnkshn ko is bat ki janch pratal kay liye nafza karain keh aya kesi dyiay gaye nmbr ko ayrtwstyns alghwrthm ki chhlny ka astamal karty hoey ayk aham nmbr haay۔
Answer: kesi fnkshn ko amly jamha phananay kay l re yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya ayk dyiay gaye nmbr ayk aham nmbr hay js ka astamal ayrtwstyns alghwrthm ki chhlny hay ، hum mndrjha zayl akdamat astamal krsktay hayn: ayk fharst bnaiyn js ki lmbaiy N+1 ki tamam hakyky akdar sy bhry hui hay ، jahan N di hogi tadad haay۔fharst kay pehlay do anasar ko ghalat par syt karain ، kywnkha 0 aur 1 bnyady tadad nahin hayn۔ 2 sy la kar 2 sy N kay mrba jra tak ki tadad ka tayn kryn۔har tadad kay l if ، agar yeh ayk aham nmbr hay (yany ، is_prime [i] sch haay) tou ، is kay tamam zurbwn ko ghair praim nmbr kay tawr par nshan zad kryn۔nmbr chyk krkay nmbr par aai ays_ praim lst main mtalkha ansar drst haay۔ yahan azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza haay: paiythwnympwrt myth dayf aai ays_praim (ayn): is_prime = [true] * (n + 1) is_prime [0] = ghalat is_prime [1] = rynj (2 ، int (math.sqrt (n)) + 1) main i kay liye ghltaghlta wapsy IS_PRIME [n] is nfaza main ، fnkshn IS_PRIME () ayk nmbr N ko un pt kay tawr par lyta hay aur agar nmbr ayk aham nmbr hay aur ghalat hay tou woh drst haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay ayk fharst ki shrwaat krta hay js ki lmbaiy N+1 ki tamam hakyky akdar sy bhry hui haay۔as kay bad yeh fharst kay pehlay do anasar ko ghalat par syt krta hay ، kywnkha 0 aur 1 bnyady tadad nahin hayn۔as kay bad 2 sy N kay mrba jra tak nmbrwn par tkrar krta haay۔har ayk nmbr kay l if ، agar yeh ayk aham nmbr hay (yany ، is_prime [i] sch haay) ، tou yeh apnay tamam zurbwn ko ghair praim nmbr kay tawr par nshan zad krta hay js sy mtalkha anasar ko IS_PRIME fharst main ghalat main trtyb diya jata haay۔aakhr main ، fnkshn chyk krta hay keh agar dyiay gaye nmbr ki janch pratal krkay di hogi tadad ayk aham nmbr hay ya nahin keh aya IS_PRIME fharst main mtalkha ansar drst haay۔ IS_PRIME () fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal: Pythonn = 17 prnt (is_prime (n)) # prnts is bat ko drst kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، hum chyk karty hain keh aya nmbr 17 IS_PRIME () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ayk aham nmbr haay۔fnkshn drst lwtta hay ، is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh 17 ayk aham nmbr haay۔

Question: "addywn ki di hogi fharst kay akhttam tak kam sy kam chhlangh ki tlash kay l a ayk prwghram lkhyn ، jahan hr add zayada sy zayada tadad main mrahal ki nmaindghy krta hay jo is pwzayshn sy chhlangh lghaiay jasktay hayn۔"
Answer: addywn ki di hogi fharst kay akhttam tak phanchnay kay liye kam sy kam chhlangh ki tlash kay l ، ، jahan hr add is pwzayshn sy kwd paiay janay waly akdamat ki zayada sy zayada tadad ki nmaindghy krta hay ، hum mthark prwghramngh ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan ayk nktaha nzar haay: anfynty kay liye mkrr krdha tamam akdar kay sath lmbaiy N ki ayk fharst DP shrwa karain ، jahan N fharst ki lmbaiy haay۔ DP fharst ka pehla ansar 0 par syt karain ، kywnkha hamain pehlay phanchnay kay liye kwdnay ki zurwrt nahin haayansar۔ fharst sy zayada aur hr ansar kay liye ، fharst main pchhlay anasar par tkrar kryn۔har pchhlay ansar kay l check ، chyk karain keh aya yeh mwjwdha ansar sy kabl rsai hay ya nhayn۔aghr yeh hay tou ، pchhlay ansar kay liye day py lst main kymt ko ap dayt karain is ki mwjwdha kymt ki kam sy kam aur day py lst main mwjwdha ansar ki kymt kay alawha 1. aakhry ansar kay liye day py lst main kymt ka azaalha karain ، jwfharst kay akhttam tak phanchnay kay liye drkar chhlanghwn ki kam sy kam tadad ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ yahan azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza haay: pythwndaf mn_jps (nmbr): ayn = lyn (nmbr) day py = [flwt ('anf')] * ayn day py [0] = 0 kay liye I (1 ، n): J kay liye rynj main (i): agar j + nums [j]> = i: dp [i] = mnt (dp [i] ، dp [j] +1) wapsy DP [n - 1] is nfaza main ، fnkshn MIN_JUMPS () un pt kay tawr par antyjr nmbrwn ki ayk fharst lyta hay aur fharst kay akhttam tak phanchnay kay liye drkar chhlangh ki kam sy kam tadad waps krta haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay anfynty kay liye mkrr krdha tamam akdar kay sath lmbaiy N ki fharst DP ki abtda krta hay ، jahan N fharst ki lmbaiy haay۔as kay bad yeh day py lst ka pehla ansar 0 par taay krta hay ، kywnkha hamain pehlay ansar tak phanchnay kay liye kwdnay ki zurwrt nahin haay۔as kay bad yeh fharst main tkrar krta hay aur hr ansar kay l it ، yeh fharst main pchhlay anasar par tkrar krta haay۔har pchhlay ansar kay l it ، yeh chyk krta hay keh aya yeh mwjwdha ansar sy kabl rsai haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، yeh pchhlay ansar kay liye day py lst main kymt ko ap dayt krta hay jo is ki mwjwdha kymt ki kam sy kam hay aur day py lst pls main mwjwdha ansar ki kymt 1. aakhr main ، fnkshn day py lst main kymt lwtata haay۔aakhry ansar ، jo fharst kay akhttam tak phanchnay kay liye drkar chhlangh ki kam sy kam tadad ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ yahan mn_jps () fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal: paiytwnwmza = [1 ، 3 ، 5 ، 8 ، 9 ، 2 ، 6 ، 7 ،6 ، 8 ، 9] prnt (MIN_JUMPS (Nums)) # prnt 3 main is msaal kay tawr par ، hamain fharst kay akhttam tak phanchnay kay liye kam sy kam chhlangh ki zurwrt hawty hay [1] [3] [5] [5] [8] [9] [2] [6] [7] [6] [8] [9] mn_jps () fnkshn ka astamal karty hawiay۔fnkshn 3 lwtta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh hamain fharst kay akhttam tak phanchnay kay liye 3 chhlangh lghanay ki zurwrt haay۔

sath ayk drst azahaar hay ، js sy ghhwnsla azahaar aur kstm aaprytrza ki ajazat di jaskty hay ، hum astyk par mbny nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔jb hum isi tarah kay akhttamy alamtwn ka samna karty [i] ، nums [i]) ، kam sy kam (zayadha sy zayadha_sw_far * nmbr [i] ، nmbr [i]) ntyjha = zayada sy zayada (ntyjha ، zayada sy zayadha_sw_far) wapsy kay ntyjay main ، fnkshn myks_ prwdakt_) un pt kay Question: bainry tlash ka astamal karty hoey addywn ki di hogi fharst main sab sy tawyl arsaay tak brahty hui tadad ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn۔
Answer: bainry srch ka astamal karty hoey addywn ki di hogi fharst main sab sy tawyl arsaay tak brahty hui tadad ko tlash karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl akdamat astamal krsktay hayn: ayk khaly fharst ki dm shrwa kryn۔ addy ki fharst aur hr add kay liye is ka tayn kryn: agar antyjr is sy zayada hay tou is sy zayada haay۔dm main aakhry ansar ، isy dm main shaml kryn۔ dusray kay mtaabk ، dm main pehlay ansar ka andayks tlash karain jo bainry tlash ka astamal karty hoey add sy zayada ya is kay brabr hawta hay aur is ansar ko antyjr kay sath tbdyl kryn۔ dm ki lmbaiy ko dwbarha bnaiyn۔azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza: paiythwndaf tawyl tryn_ankryzangh_swbsyns (nmbr): dm = [] nmbr kay liye nmbr: agar dm nahin ya nmbr> dm nahin hay tou [-1]: tyls۔ aay py pyynda (nmbr): baien ، dien = 0 ، lyn ((daiyn = 0 ، lyn (dm) - Question: mthark prwghramngh ka astamal karty hoey do dawrwn kay mabyn lywnshtyn fasalay ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk fnkshn ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: lywnshyn ka fasalha do dawrwn kay mabyn mmasalt ka ayk pymanha haay۔as ki wzuahat ayk tar ko dusray main tbdyl karnay kay liye drkar tbdylywn ki kam sy kam tadad kay tawr par ki hogi hay ، jahan tbdyly ayk andraj ، hazaf karnay ya kesi krdar ka mtbadl hawskty haay۔lywnshyn fasalha trmym kay fasalay kay nam sy bhi jana jata haay۔as main anfarmyshn thywry ، lsanyat ، aur kmpywtr sains main ayply kyshnza mwjwd hayn۔ mthark prwghramngh ka astamal karty hoey do dawrwn kay mabyn lywnshyn fasalay ka hasab lghanay kay liye ، hum dono tarwn kay sabkha jwraay kay darmiyan fasalwn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mytrks ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham khaly sabkha aur dono dawrwn kay sabkhawn kay darmiyan fasalwn kay sath mytrks ka aaghaza krsktay hayn۔as kay bad hum sabkha tkrar kay rshtay ka astamal karty hoey sabkha jwraay kay baky jwraay par tkrar krsktay hain aur mytrks ko pُr krsktay hayn: agar dono dawrwn main mwjwdha pwzayshnwn kay harwf ayk jesay hain tou ، fasalha mwjwdha kay baghair sabkha kay darmiyan fasalha jesa hi haay۔harwf۔azaghr: paiythndaf lywnshtyn_dastyns (ays 1 ، ays 2): aym ، ayn = lyn (ays 1) ، lyn (ays 2) day py = [[0] * (ayn + 1) rynj main _ kay liye (aym + 1)] kay liye (aym + 1)aym + 1): day py [i] [0] = i rynj main jay kay liye (n + 1): day py [0] [j] = j in range (1 ، m + 1) kay liye (1 ، m + 1): J kay liye rynj main (1 ، n + 1): agar S1 [i - Question: "wkfha kay drkht ki nmaindghy karnay wali ayk azaghr klas lkhyn aur wkfwn ko mwsar andaza main dakhl karnay ، tlash karnay aur door karnay kay tarykwn ko nafza kryn۔"
is rkawt kay sath kesi sbry ki zayada sy zayada rkm tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram bnaiyn keh sbry main koi tyn anasar lghatar nahin hayn۔
Answer: is rkawt kay sath kesi sbry ki zayada sy zayada rkm tlash karnay kay liye keh sbry main koi tyn anasar lghatar nahin hain ، hum mthark prwghramngh astamal krsktay hayn۔ham ntyjha tlash karnay kay liye un pt srny ki tarah ayk hi saiza kay maawn srny ka mjmwaha brkrar rakh saktay hayn۔rkm [i] sbry ara [0..i] kay ntaij ko astwr krty hay ، yany sbry aar aar main zayada sy zayada mmknha rkm [0..i] is tarah keh koi tyn anasar lghatar nahin hawtay hayn۔ham mndrjha zayl tkrar kay talk ko rkm bhrnay kay l use astamal krsktay hayn: rkm [i] = zayada sy zayada (rkm [i-1] ، rkm [i-2] + arr [i] ، rkm [i-3] + arr [i [i] + aar aar [I-1]) is rkawt kay sath ayk sbry ka zayada sy zayada mjmwaha keh sbry main koi tyn anasar lghatar nahin hain ، mjmway tawr par zayada sy zayada kymt haay۔ yahan azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza: paiythndaf myks_sm_swbry (nmbr): n = len (nums) agar n == 0: waps 0 agar n == 1: wapsy nmbr [0] agar n == 2: waps zayada sy zayada (nmbr [0] ، nmbr [1]) rkm = [0]* n rkm [0] = nmbr [0] rkm [1] = zayada sy zayada (nmbr [0] ، nmbr [1]) rkm [2] = zayada sy zayada (nmbr [0] + nmbr [2] ، nmbr [1] ،nmbr [2]) I main I (3 ، n) kay liay: rkm [i] = zayada sy zayada (rkm [i-1] ، rkm [i-2] + nmbr [i] ، rkm [i-3] + nmbr [i] + nums [I-1]) is nfaza main zayada sy zayada (rkm) ki wapsy ، fnkshn myks_sm_swbry () un pt kay tawr par antyjr nmbrwn ki ayk fharst lyta hay aur is ki tshkyl kay sath ayk sab sy zayada sy zayada ka mjmwaha waps krta hay keh sbaray main tyn anasar koi bhi anasar nahin haay۔lghatar hayn۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay un pt srny ki tarah ayk hi saiza kay maawn srny mjmwaha ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad yeh mzakwrha bala tkrar kay rshtay ka astamal karty hoey mjmway saf main bhrta haay۔aakhr main ، fnkshn zayada sy zayada kymt ko rkm main waps krta haay۔ yahan myks_sm_swbry () fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal: paiytwnwms = [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7 ، 8] prnt (myks_sm_swbry (nmbr))# prnts 27 un msaal kay tawr par ، hamain is rkawt kay sath ayk sbry Question: kesi fnkshn ko yeh chyk karnay kay liye nafza karain keh aya dyiay gaye nmbr bt waiza aapryshnza ka astamal karty hoey do ki taakt haay۔
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya kesi dyiay gaye nmbr main bt waiza aapryshnza ka astamal karty hoey do ki taakt hay ، hum bainry nmbrwn ki mndrjha zayl praprty ko astamal krsktay hain jo do kay akhtyarat hayn: un ki bainry nmaindghy main un ka sirf ayk syt thwraa sa haay۔ham is praprty ko yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hain keh aya is ki sanaiy nmaindghy main syt bts ki tadad ghn kar koi nmbr do ki taakt haay۔aghr ghnty 1 hay tou ، nmbr do ki taakt haay۔taham ، is nktaha nzar ko msilha hal karnay main O (lagh ayn) wkt lghta haay۔ham bt waiza aapryshnza ka astamal karty hoey O (1) main wkt ki pychydghy ko bhatr bna saktay hayn۔ yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya koi nmbr bt wais aapryshnza ka astamal karty hoey do ki taakt hay ya nahin ، hum mndrjha zayl mshahaday ko astamal krsktay hayn: agar koi nmbr do ki taakt hay tou ، is ki bainry nmaindghy sirf haay۔ayk syt btmsaal kay tawr par ، 8 ki bainry nmaindghy 1000 hay ، js main sirf ayk syt bt haay۔ham is mshahaday ko yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hain keh aya koi nmbr bt waiza aur aaprytr ka astamal karty hoey do ki taakt haay۔ agar hum do ki taakt sy 1 ko ghhtatay hain tou ، hamain ayk nmbr mil jata hay js main syt bt plt janay kay dien taraf kay tamam tkraay hawtay hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، agar hum 8 sy 1 ko ghhtatay hain tou ، hamain 7 mil jata hay ، js ki bainry nmaindghy 0111 haay۔ agar hum bt waiza aur do aur is kay pyshrw ki taakt lytay hain tou ، hamain 0 mil jata haay۔ msaal kay tawr par ، agar hum bt waiza aur 8 sy lyn۔awr 7 ، hamain 0 mil jata haay۔ agar koi nmbr do ki taakt nahin hay tou ، is ki sanaiy nmaindghy main ayk sy zayada syt bt haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، 6 ki bainry nmaindghy 0110 hay ، js main do syt bts hayn۔aghr hum bt waiza aur 6 aur 5 kay lytay hain tou ، hamain ghair safr ki kymt mil jati haay۔ azaghr main is nktaha nzar ka nfaza haay: paiythndaf aai ays_ pawr_f_tyw (ayn): wapsy n> 0 aur (n & (n - 1)) ==0 is nfaza main ، fnkshn IS_POWER_OF_TWO () un pt kay tawr par ayk add N lyta hay aur agar N do aur jhwty ki taakt hay tou woh sch waps aajata haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay chyk krta hay agar n msabt haay۔aghr yeh msabt nahin hay tou ، fnkshn ghalat lwtata haay۔aghr n msabt hay tou ، fnkshn bt waiza aur N aur is kay pyshrw N-1 lyta haay۔aghr ntyjha 0 hay tou ، fnkshn drst lwtta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh N do ki taakt haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، fnkshn ghalat lwtata haay۔ IS_POWER_OF_TWO () fnkshn ki msaal kay tawr par astamal: Pythonn = 8 prnt (is_power_of_two (n)) # prnts is msaal kay tawr par ، hum chyk karty hain keh aya nmbr 8 IS_POWER_OF_TWO () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey do ki taakt hay ya nhayn۔fnkshn drst lwtta hay ، is bat ki nshandhay krta hay keh 8 do ki taakt haay۔

Question: "kdaanay kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey dyiay gaye srklr srny main zayada sy zayada rkm sbry ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn ، is rkawt kay sath keh sbry main srklr saf kay hr nsaf hasaay sy kam aza kam ayk ansar hona zurwry haay۔"
Answer: kdaanay kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey dyiay gaye srklr srny main zayada sy zayada rkm sbry ko tlash karnay kay l the ، is rkawt kay sath keh sbry ko srklr srny kay hr nsaf hasaay sy kam aza kam ayk ansar hona zurwry hay ، hum mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn: kdaanay kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey zayada sy zayada rkm sbry ko tlash kryn۔dyiay gaye srny kay liye kdanay kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey di hogi srny kay liay۔bsawrt dyghr ، zayada sy zayada rkm waps kryn۔ is nktaha nzar kay pychhay khyal yeh hay keh zayada sy zayada rkm sbry ya tou ayk sbry hawskty hay jo srklr srny kay ghrd lpyt nahin lyty hay ya srklr saf kay ghrd lpytnay wala sab ary۔aghr zayada sy zayada rkm sbry srklr srny kay ghrd lpyt nahin lyty hay tou ، hum isy tlash karnay kay liye kdaanay kay alghwrthm ka astamal krsktay hayn۔aghr
